11016590Di2015UniqueSeparator// Declare this as a Generic method of Type T so that we can pass in aDi2015NewLine// List containing anything and easily get the appropriate Type objectDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> SelectNonNull<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> ListItems, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> itemsFromList;Di2015NewLine    // Get a reference to the PropertyInfo for the propertyDi2015NewLine    // we're doing a null-check on.Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo variable = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    if (variable == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The property does not exist on this item type:Di2015NewLine        // just return all itemsDi2015NewLine        itemsFromList = from item in ListItemsDi2015NewLine                        select item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        itemsFromList = from item in ListItemsDi2015NewLine                        // GetValue will check the value of item'sDi2015NewLine                        // instance of the specified property.Di2015NewLine                        where variable.GetValue(item, null) != nullDi2015NewLine                        select item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return itemsFromList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11016590Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar NonNullCountries = SelectNonNull(ListItems, "Countries");Di2015NewLinevar NonNullCities = SelectNonNull(ListItems, "cities");Di2015NewLine
11016590Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> SelectNonNull<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo variable = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    if (variable == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Specified property does not exist on this item type:Di2015NewLine        //just return all itemsDi2015NewLine        return from item in sourceDi2015NewLine                select item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return from item in sourceDi2015NewLine                where variable.GetValue(item, null) != nullDi2015NewLine                select item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11016590Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar NonNullCitiesOrCountries = ListItems.SelectNonNull("Countries")Di2015NewLine                                        .SelectNonNull("cities");Di2015NewLine

' + result.WhateverIsReturning);                    Di2015NewLine         },Di2015NewLine         error: function (result) {Di2015NewLine             alert('Oh no :(');Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     });Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine</script>Di2015NewLine

11020692Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var v = Partitions(5, 3, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < v.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < v[i].Count; x++)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(v[i][x] + " "); Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static private List<List<int>> Partitions(int total, int stacks, int max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<List<int>> partitions = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (total <= 1 || stacks == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (total <= max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                partitions.Add(new List<int>());Di2015NewLine                partitions[0].Add(total);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return partitions;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int y = Math.Min(total, max); y >= 1; y--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var w = Partitions(total - y, stacks - 1, y);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < w.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                w[i].Add(y);Di2015NewLine                partitions.Add(w[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return partitions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11022868Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String getString(String sql)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (DataSet ds = new DataSet())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string connstring = String.Format("Server={0};Port={1}; User Id={2};Password={3};Database={4};", tbHost, tbPort, tbUser, tbPass, tbDataBaseName);Di2015NewLine        using (NpgsqlConnection conn = new NpgsqlConnection(connstring))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (NpgsqlDataAdapter da = new NpgsqlDataAdapter(sql, conn))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                da.Fill(ds);Di2015NewLine                // You did check count of tablesDi2015NewLine                if (ds.Tables.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                   DataTable dt = ds.Tables[0];Di2015NewLine                   // But forgot to check count of RowsDi2015NewLine                   if (dt.Rows.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                      object o = dt.Rows[0][0];Di2015NewLine                      //  And returned value for nullsDi2015NewLine                      //  Check for null is here because I don't knowDi2015NewLine                      //  This Postgresql classesDi2015NewLine                      if (o != DBNull.Value && o != null)Di2015NewLine                      {Di2015NewLine                         return o.ToString();Di2015NewLine                      }Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Return default valueDi2015NewLine    return "0";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11028370Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string[]> GetDiff(List<string[]> listA, list<string[] listB>)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var diff = new List<string[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var a in listA)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool found = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var b in listB)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (a.SequenceEqual(b))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!found)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            diff.Add(a);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var b in listB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool found = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var a in listA)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (b.SequenceEqual(a))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!found)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            diff.Add(b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return diff;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11033438Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Form Grayscale(Form tocover)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var frm = new FormDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FormBorderStyle = FormBorderStyle.None,Di2015NewLine            ControlBox = false,Di2015NewLine            ShowInTaskbar = false,Di2015NewLine            StartPosition = FormStartPosition.Manual,Di2015NewLine            AutoScaleMode = AutoScaleMode.None,Di2015NewLine            Location = tocover.PointToScreen(tocover.ClientRectangle.Location),Di2015NewLine            Size = tocover.ClientSizeDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    frm.Paint += (sender, args) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bmp = GetFormImageWithoutBorders(tocover);Di2015NewLine            bmp = ConvertToGrayscale(bmp);Di2015NewLine            args.Graphics.DrawImage(bmp, args.ClipRectangle.Location);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    frm.Show(tocover);Di2015NewLine    return frm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Bitmap ConvertToGrayscale(Bitmap source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bm = new Bitmap(source.Width, source.Height);Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < bm.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < bm.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color c = source.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine            var luma = (int)(c.R * 0.3 + c.G * 0.59 + c.B * 0.11);Di2015NewLine            bm.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(luma, luma, luma));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Bitmap GetControlImage(Control ctl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bm = new Bitmap(ctl.Width, ctl.Height);Di2015NewLine    ctl.DrawToBitmap(bm, new Rectangle(0, 0, ctl.Width, ctl.Height));Di2015NewLine    return bm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Bitmap GetFormImageWithoutBorders(Form frm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the form's whole image.Di2015NewLine    using (Bitmap wholeForm = GetControlImage(frm))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // See how far the form's upper left corner isDi2015NewLine        // from the upper left corner of its client area.Di2015NewLine        Point origin = frm.PointToScreen(new Point(0, 0));Di2015NewLine        int dx = origin.X - frm.Left;Di2015NewLine        int dy = origin.Y - frm.Top;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the client area into a new Bitmap.Di2015NewLine        int wid = frm.ClientSize.Width;Di2015NewLine        int hgt = frm.ClientSize.Height;Di2015NewLine        var bm = new Bitmap(wid, hgt);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics gr = Graphics.FromImage(bm))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gr.DrawImage(wholeForm, 0, 0,Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(dx, dy, wid, hgt),Di2015NewLine                GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return bm;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11035901Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <cv.h>Di2015NewLine#include <highgui.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main(int argc, char* argv[])Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    cv::Mat image = cv::imread(argv[1]);Di2015NewLine    cv::Mat new_image = cv::Mat::zeros(image.size(), image.type());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Change contrast: new_image(i,j) = alpha*image(i,j) + beta */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double alpha = 1.8;     // [1.0-3.0]Di2015NewLine    int beta = 100;         // [0-100]Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < image.rows; y++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < image.cols; x++)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine        for (int c = 0; c < 3; c++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new_image.at<cv::Vec3b>(y,x)[c] = Di2015NewLine            cv::saturate_cast<uchar>(alpha * (image.at<cv::Vec3b>(y,x)[c]) + beta);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    cv::imshow("contrast", new_image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Convert RGB Mat into HSV color space */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cv::Mat hsv;Di2015NewLine    cv::cvtColor(new_image, hsv, CV_BGR2HSV);Di2015NewLine    std::vector<cv::Mat> v;Di2015NewLine    cv::split(hsv,v);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Perform threshold on the S channel of hSv    Di2015NewLine    int thres = 15;Di2015NewLine    cv::threshold(v[1], v[1], thres, 255, cv::THRESH_BINARY_INV);Di2015NewLine    cv::imshow("saturation", v[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Erode & Dilate */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int erosion_size = 6;   Di2015NewLine    cv::Mat element = cv::getStructuringElement(cv::MORPH_CROSS,Di2015NewLine                          cv::Size(2 * erosion_size + 1, 2 * erosion_size + 1), Di2015NewLine                          cv::Point(erosion_size, erosion_size) );Di2015NewLine    cv::erode(v[1], v[1], element);Di2015NewLine    cv::dilate(v[1], v[1], element);    Di2015NewLine    cv::imshow("binary", v[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Bounding box */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Invert colorsDi2015NewLine    cv::bitwise_not(v[1], v[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Store the set of points in the image before assembling the bounding boxDi2015NewLine    std::vector<cv::Point> points;Di2015NewLine    cv::Mat_<uchar>::iterator it = v[1].begin<uchar>();Di2015NewLine    cv::Mat_<uchar>::iterator end = v[1].end<uchar>();Di2015NewLine    for (; it != end; ++it)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (*it) points.push_back(it.pos());Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Compute minimal bounding boxDi2015NewLine    cv::RotatedRect box = cv::minAreaRect(cv::Mat(points));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw bounding box in the original image (debug purposes)Di2015NewLine    cv::Point2f vertices[4];Di2015NewLine    box.points(vertices);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cv::line(image, vertices[i], vertices[(i + 1) % 4], cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 2, CV_AA);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cv::imshow("box", image);    Di2015NewLine    cvWaitKey(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11039428Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SwitchControls(ControlType pType) {Di2015NewLine    // Keep a reference to whichever control is currently in MainPanel.Di2015NewLine    Control ctlOld = MainPanel.Controls[0];Di2015NewLine    // Create a new Control objectDi2015NewLine    Control ctlNew = null;Di2015NewLine    // Make a switch statement to find the correct type of Control to create.Di2015NewLine    switch (pType) {Di2015NewLine        case (ControlType.Gear):Di2015NewLine           ctlNew = new ctlGear();Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        case (ControlType.Map):Di2015NewLine           ctlNew = new ctlMap();Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        case (ControlType.Graph):Di2015NewLine           ctlNew = new ctlGraph();Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        case (ControlType.Car):Di2015NewLine            ctlNew = new ctlCar();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case (ControlType.Person):Di2015NewLine            ctlNew = new ctlPerson();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        // don't worry about a default, unless you have one you would want to be the default.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Don't try to add a null Control.Di2015NewLine    if (ctlNew == null) return();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MainPanel.Controls.Add(ctlNew);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MainPanel.Controls.Remove(ctlOld);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11046595Di2015UniqueSeparator# Get the random values.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineop = random_from ("+-/*")Di2015NewLinen1 = random_from ("123456789")Di2015NewLinen2 = random_from ("123456789")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# For subtraction, make sure n1 >= n2.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif op = "-" and n1 < n2:Di2015NewLine    tmp = n1;Di2015NewLine    n1 = n2;Di2015NewLine    n2 = tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# For division, make sure n1 is integral multiplier of n2.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif op = "/":Di2015NewLine    n1 = n1 * n2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# Return expression in ALL cases.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn n1 + op + n2Di2015NewLine

11047191Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] m_cCRCHiArray = { Di2015NewLine    0x00, 0xC1, 0x81, 0x40, 0x01, 0xC0, 0x80, 0x41,  0x81, 0x40 Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] m_cCRCLoArray = { Di2015NewLine    0x00, 0xC0, 0xC1, 0x01, 0xC3, 0x03, 0x02, 0xC2, 0x80, 0x40 Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ushort i_pwCalculateCRC16Continuation(byte[] data, ushort wCRC)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte cCRCHi = (byte)((wCRC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine    byte cCRCLo = (byte)(wCRC & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte cIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cIndex = (byte)(cCRCHi ^ data[i]);Di2015NewLine        cCRCHi = (byte)(cCRCLo ^ m_cCRCHiArray[cIndex]);Di2015NewLine        cCRCLo = m_cCRCLoArray[cIndex];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (byte)((cCRCHi << 8) + cCRCLo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11048296Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UploadFileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public UploadFile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Filename { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string ContentType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Stream Stream { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic byte[] UploadFiles(string address, IEnumerable<UploadFile> files, NameValueCollection values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var request = WebRequest.Create(address);Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    var boundary = "---------------------------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x", NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine    boundary = "--" + boundary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var requestStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Write the valuesDi2015NewLine        foreach (string name in values.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"{1}{1}", name, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(values[name] + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write the filesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var file in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\"{2}", file.Name, file.Filename, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Type: {0}{1}{1}", file.ContentType, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            file.Stream.CopyTo(requestStream);Di2015NewLine            buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var boundaryBuffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + "--");Di2015NewLine        requestStream.Write(boundaryBuffer, 0, boundaryBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        responseStream.CopyTo(stream);Di2015NewLine        return stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11048772Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FormatValue(object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(value, null))Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type valueType = value.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (valueType == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine        return value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (valueType.IsPrimitive && valueType != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        return value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return String.Format("\\"{0}\\"",Di2015NewLine        value.ToString().Replace("\\"", "\\"\\"");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11050262Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void AllPaths(int[,] chessBoard, int startX, int startY, int dimensionX, int dimensionY) {Di2015NewLine  // All the moves a knight can makeDi2015NewLine  int[] movementY = { -2, -2, -1, -1,  1,  1,  2,  2 };Di2015NewLine  int[] movementX = { -1,  1, -2,  2, -2,  2, -1,  1 };Di2015NewLine  chessBoard[startX, startY] = 0;Di2015NewLine  int cnt = dimensionX * dimensionY - 1:Di2015NewLine  int step = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (cnt > 0) {Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < dimension; x++) {Di2015NewLine      for (int y = 0; y < dimension; y++) {Di2015NewLine        if (chessBoard[x, y] == step) {Di2015NewLine          for (int k = 0; k < 8; k++) {Di2015NewLine            int dx = movementX[k] + x, dy = movementY[k] + y;Di2015NewLine            if (dx >= 0 && dx < dimensionX && dy >= 0 && dy < dimensionY) {Di2015NewLine              if (chessBoard[dx, dy] == -1) {Di2015NewLine                chessBoard[dx, dy] = step + 1;Di2015NewLine                cnt--;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    step++;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11052721Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RequiredIfAttribute : ValidationAttribute, IClientValidatableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private RequiredAttribute _innerAttribute = new RequiredAttribute();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string DependentProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public object TargetValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RequiredIfAttribute(string dependentProperty, object targetValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.DependentProperty = dependentProperty;Di2015NewLine        this.TargetValue = targetValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get a reference to the property this validation depends uponDi2015NewLine        var containerType = validationContext.ObjectInstance.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var field = containerType.GetProperty(this.DependentProperty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (field != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the value of the dependent propertyDi2015NewLine            var dependentvalue = field.GetValue(validationContext.ObjectInstance, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // compare the value against the target valueDi2015NewLine            if ((dependentvalue == null && this.TargetValue == null) ||Di2015NewLine                (dependentvalue != null && dependentvalue.Equals(this.TargetValue)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // match => means we should try validating this fieldDi2015NewLine                if (!_innerAttribute.IsValid(value))Di2015NewLine                    // validation failed - return an errorDi2015NewLine                    return new ValidationResult(this.ErrorMessage, new[] { validationContext.MemberName });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ModelClientValidationRule> GetClientValidationRules(ModelMetadata metadata, ControllerContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rule = new ModelClientValidationRule()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorMessage = FormatErrorMessage(metadata.GetDisplayName()),Di2015NewLine            ValidationType = "requiredif",Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string depProp = BuildDependentPropertyId(metadata, context as ViewContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find the value on the control we depend on;Di2015NewLine        // if it's a bool, format it javascript style Di2015NewLine        // (the default is True or False!)Di2015NewLine        string targetValue = (this.TargetValue ?? "").ToString();Di2015NewLine        if (this.TargetValue.GetType() == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine            targetValue = targetValue.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rule.ValidationParameters.Add("dependentproperty", depProp);Di2015NewLine        rule.ValidationParameters.Add("targetvalue", targetValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return rule;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string BuildDependentPropertyId(ModelMetadata metadata, ViewContext viewContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // build the ID of the propertyDi2015NewLine        string depProp = viewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldId(this.DependentProperty);Di2015NewLine        // unfortunately this will have the name of the current field appended to the beginning,Di2015NewLine        // because the TemplateInfo's context has had this fieldname appended to it. Instead, weDi2015NewLine        // want to get the context as though it was one level higher (i.e. outside the current property,Di2015NewLine        // which is the containing object (our Person), and hence the same level as the dependent property.Di2015NewLine        var thisField = metadata.PropertyName + "_";Di2015NewLine        if (depProp.StartsWith(thisField))Di2015NewLine            // strip it off againDi2015NewLine            depProp = depProp.Substring(thisField.Length);Di2015NewLine        return depProp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11052721Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <reference path="jquery-1.4.4-vsdoc.js" />Di2015NewLine/// <reference path="jquery.validate.unobtrusive.js" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$.validator.addMethod('requiredif',Di2015NewLinefunction (value, element, parameters) {Di2015NewLine    var id = '#' + parameters['dependentproperty'];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the target value (as a string, Di2015NewLine    // as that's what actual value will be)Di2015NewLine    var targetvalue = parameters['targetvalue'];Di2015NewLine    targetvalue =Di2015NewLine      (targetvalue == null ? 11054925Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const long MILLISECOND_IN_MINUTE = 60 * 1000;Di2015NewLine    private const long TICKS_IN_MILLISECOND = 10000;Di2015NewLine    private const long TICKS_IN_MINUTE = MILLISECOND_IN_MINUTE * TICKS_IN_MILLISECOND;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private System.Timers.Timer timer;Di2015NewLine    private long nextIntervalTick;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void frmMain()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine        timer.AutoReset = false;Di2015NewLine        timer.Elapsed += new System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler(timer_Elapsed);Di2015NewLine        timer.Interval = GetInitialInterval();Di2015NewLine        timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void timer_Elapsed(object sender, System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(DateTime.Now.ToString("hh:mm:ss tt"));Di2015NewLine        timer.Interval = GetInterval();Di2015NewLine        timer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private double GetInitialInterval()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        double timeToNextMin = ((60 - now.Second) * 1000 - now.Millisecond) + 15;Di2015NewLine        nextIntervalTick = now.Ticks + ((long)timeToNextMin * TICKS_IN_MILLISECOND);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return timeToNextMin;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private double GetInterval()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nextIntervalTick += TICKS_IN_MINUTE;Di2015NewLine        return TicksToMs(nextIntervalTick - DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private double TicksToMs(long ticks)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (double)(ticks / TICKS_IN_MILLISECOND);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11055726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IPropagatorBlock<TInput, TOutput>Di2015NewLine    CreateConcurrentOrderedTransformBlock<TInput, TOutput>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TInput, TOutput> transform)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new TransformBlock<Task<TOutput>, TOutput>(t => t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var processor = new ActionBlock<Tuple<TInput, Action<TOutput>>>(Di2015NewLine        tuple => tuple.Item2(transform(tuple.Item1)),Di2015NewLine        new ExecutionDataflowBlockOptionsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MaxDegreeOfParallelism = DataflowBlockOptions.UnboundedDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var enqueuer = new ActionBlock<TInput>(Di2015NewLine        async item =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<TOutput>();Di2015NewLine            await processor.SendAsync(Di2015NewLine                new Tuple<TInput, Action<TOutput>>(item, tcs.SetResult));Di2015NewLine            await queue.SendAsync(tcs.Task);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    enqueuer.Completion.ContinueWith(Di2015NewLine        _ =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.Complete();Di2015NewLine            processor.Complete();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return DataflowBlock.Encapsulate(enqueuer, queue);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11060547Di2015UniqueSeparatorSeek( 0, SeekOrigin.Current );
11060547Di2015UniqueSeparatoroverride public long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   long pos = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   switch(origin)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      case SeekOrigin.Begin :Di2015NewLine         pos = offset;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLine      case SeekOrigin.Current :Di2015NewLine         pos = Position + offset;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLine      case SeekOrigin.End :Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // We generally disallow seeking of the streamDi2015NewLine   // However, in unmanaged code, many people use Seek(0,CURR) to retrieve    // the current positionDi2015NewLine   // Special case (that is, if Seek does not change position, do not Di2015NewLine   // throw an exception)Di2015NewLine   if (pos==Position)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return pos;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException("ForwardOnlyEventingReadStream does not support Seek()");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11060729Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Store(dynamic serviceObject)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //store serviceObject somewhere you can use it later.Di2015NewLine    //Depending on your situation you may want toDi2015NewLine    // set a flag or use a ManualResetEvent to notifyDi2015NewLine    // that serviceObject is ready to be used.Di2015NewLine    //Any pre proccess can be done here too.Di2015NewLine    //Take care of thread affinity,Di2015NewLine    // since this may come from the ThreadPoolDi2015NewLine    // and the consuming thread may be another one,Di2015NewLine    // you may need some synchronization.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11064026Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic async Task MultiplyMatricesAsync(double[,] matA, double[,] matB, double[,] result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int matACols = matA.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine  int matBCols = matB.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine  int matARows = matA.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var tasks = Enumerable.Range(0, matARows).Select(i =>Di2015NewLine      Task.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < matBCols; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // Use a temporary to improve parallel performance.Di2015NewLine          double temp = 0;Di2015NewLine          for (int k = 0; k < matACols; k++)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            temp += matA[i, k] * matB[k, j];Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          result[i, j] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }));Di2015NewLine  await Task.WhenAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11065185Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace YourNamespaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class BindableGrid : UserControlDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty WidthsProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.Register("Widths",Di2015NewLine                                        typeof(ObservableCollection<int>),Di2015NewLine                                        typeof(BindableGrid),Di2015NewLine                                        new PropertyMetadata(Widths_Changed));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public BindableGrid()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ObservableCollection<int> WidthsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (ObservableCollection<int>)GetValue(WidthsProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(WidthsProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Widths_Changed(DependencyObject obj,Di2015NewLine                                           DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var grid = obj as BindableGrid;Di2015NewLine            if (grid != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                grid.OnWidthsChanged(e.OldValue as ObservableCollection<int>);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnWidthsChanged(ObservableCollection<int> oldValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (oldValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                oldValue.CollectionChanged -= Widths_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Widths != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Widths.CollectionChanged += Widths_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RecreateGrid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Widths_CollectionChanged(object sender,Di2015NewLine                                              NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We'll just clear and recreate the entire grid each timeDi2015NewLine            // the collection changes.Di2015NewLine            // Alternatively, you could use e.Action to determine what theDi2015NewLine            // actual change was and apply that (e.g. add or delete aDi2015NewLine            // single column definition). Di2015NewLine            RecreateGrid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void RecreateGrid()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Recreate the column definitions.Di2015NewLine            grid.ColumnDefinitions.Clear();Di2015NewLine            foreach (int width in Widths)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Use new GridLength(1, GridUnitType.Star) for a "*" column.Di2015NewLine                var coldef = new ColumnDefinition() { Width = new GridLength(width) };Di2015NewLine                grid.ColumnDefinitions.Add(coldef);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now recreate the content of the grid.Di2015NewLine            grid.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Widths.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int width = Widths[i];Di2015NewLine                var textblock = new TextBlock() { Text = width.ToString() };Di2015NewLine                Grid.SetColumn(textblock, i);Di2015NewLine                grid.Children.Add(textblock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11066003Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate hook As IntPtrDi2015NewLinePrivate isVisible As Boolean = FalseDi2015NewLinePrivate keyHookDelegate As New KBDLLHookProc(AddressOf Me.KeyHook)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub Main_Load(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles MyBase.LoadDi2015NewLine    'Set the key hook:Di2015NewLine    hook = SetWindowsHookEx(KeyboardHook.WH_KEYBOARD_LL, Me.keyHookDelegate, Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetModules()(0)), 0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If hook = IntPtr.Zero ThenDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Failed to set global key hook.", "Key Hook Set Failiure", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error)Di2015NewLine        Throw New ApplicationException("Failed to set key hook.")Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function KeyHook(ByVal nCode As Integer, ByVal wParam As IntPtr, ByVal lParam As IntPtr) As IntegerDi2015NewLine    If nCode = KeyboardHook.HC_ACTION ThenDi2015NewLine        Dim p As Integer = wParam.ToInt32()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If p = WM_KEYDOWN OrElse p = WM_SYSKEYDOWN ThenDi2015NewLine            Dim keyCode As Keys = CType(CType(Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, GetType(KBDLLHOOKSTRUCT)), KBDLLHOOKSTRUCT).vkCode, Keys) ' This gets the key that was pressed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            'Cancel it!Di2015NewLine            Return 1Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return KeyboardHook.CallNextHookEx(IntPtr.Zero, nCode, wParam, lParam)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineProtected Overrides Sub Finalize()Di2015NewLine    TryDi2015NewLine        'Remove the key hook:Di2015NewLine        If hook <> IntPtr.Zero Then KeyboardHook.UnhookWindowsHookEx(hook)Di2015NewLine    FinallyDi2015NewLine        MyBase.Finalize()Di2015NewLine    End TryDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

11067596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IOrganizationService GetConnection(bool multi)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var waitHandle = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    dynamic result = null;Di2015NewLine    if(!multi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parallel.For(0, 1, i =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           result = InitializeCRMService();Di2015NewLine           waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItemDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            new WaitCallbackDi2015NewLine            (Di2015NewLine                (_) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = InitializeCRMService();Di2015NewLine                    waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //We wait until the job is done...Di2015NewLine    waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    return result as IOrganizationService; //Or use an adecuate castingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11067596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void GetConnection(bool multi, Action<IOrganizationService> callback)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(callback, null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("callback");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(!multi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parallel.For(0, 1, i =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            callback(InitializeCRMService() as IOrganizationService);Di2015NewLine            //Or instead of using "as", use an adecuate castingDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItemDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine             new WaitCallbackDi2015NewLine             (Di2015NewLine                 (_) =>Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                      callback(InitializeCRMService() as IOrganizationService);Di2015NewLine                      //Or instead of using "as", use an adecuate castingDi2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine             )Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11067596Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetConnectionDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        false,Di2015NewLine        (seriveObject) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* do something with seriveObject here */Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine//Remember, even after GetConnection completed seriveObject may not be readyDi2015NewLine// That's because it is asyncrhonous: you want to say "hey Bob do this for me"Di2015NewLine// and you can go do something elseDi2015NewLine// after a while Bob comes back an says:Di2015NewLine// "that thing you asked me to do? well here is the result".Di2015NewLine// We call that a callback, and the point is that you didn't have to wait for BobDi2015NewLine// you just kept doing your stuff...Di2015NewLine//So... when is seriveObject ready? I don't know.Di2015NewLine//But when seriveObject is ready the callback will run and then you can use itDi2015NewLine

11073285Di2015UniqueSeparatorString JsonDifferenceReport(String objectName,Di2015NewLine                            JsonObject first,Di2015NewLine                            JsonObject second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(objectName))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("objectName");Di2015NewLine  if(null==first)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine  if(null==second)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine  List<String> allKeys = new List<String>();Di2015NewLine  foreach(String key in first.Keys)Di2015NewLine    if (!allKeys.Any(X => X.Equals(key))) allKeys.Add(key);Di2015NewLine  foreach(String key in second.Keys)Di2015NewLine    if (!allKeys.Any(X => X.Equals(key))) allKeys.Add(key);Di2015NewLine  String results = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine  foreach(String key in allKeys)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    JsonValue v1 = first[key];Di2015NewLine    JsonValue v1 = second[key];Di2015NewLine    if (((null==v1) != (null==v2)) || !v1.Equals(v2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(results))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         results = "differences: {\\n";Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      results += "\\t" + objectName + ": {\\n";Di2015NewLine      results += "\\t\\tfield: " + key + ",\\n";Di2015NewLine      results += "\\t\\toldvalue: " + (null==v1)? "null" : v1.ToString() + ",\\n";Di2015NewLine      results += "\\t\\tnewvalue: " + (null==v2)? "null" : v2.ToString() + "\\n";Di2015NewLine      results += "\\t}\\n";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if(!String.IsNullOrEmpty(results))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    results += "}\\n";Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11073285Di2015UniqueSeparatorJsonValue
11073285Di2015UniqueSeparator  if ((null==v1) || (v1.JsonType == JsonType.JsonPrimitive)Di2015NewLine   || (null==v2) || (v2.JsonType == JsonType.JsonPrimitive))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    results += "\\t\\tfield: " + key + ",\\n";Di2015NewLine    results += "\\t\\toldvalue: " + (null==v1) ? "null" : v1.ToString() + ",\\n";Di2015NewLine    results += "\\t\\tnewvalue: " + (null==v2) ? "null" : v2.ToString() + "\\n";Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    results + JsonDifferenceReport(key, v1, v2);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

11075818Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring str = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLinestring low_str = str.ToLower();Di2015NewLineConsole.Clear();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Thank you. 11075996Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Point> PointsInTriangle(Point pt1, Point pt2, Point pt3)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (pt1.Y == pt2.Y && pt1.Y == pt3.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The given points must form a triangle.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Point tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (pt2.X < pt1.X)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tmp = pt1;Di2015NewLine        pt1 = pt2;Di2015NewLine        pt2 = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (pt3.X < pt2.X)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tmp = pt2;Di2015NewLine        pt2 = pt3;Di2015NewLine        pt3 = tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (pt2.X < pt1.X)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp = pt1;Di2015NewLine            pt1 = pt2;Di2015NewLine            pt2 = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var baseFunc = CreateFunc(pt1, pt3);Di2015NewLine    var line1Func = pt1.X == pt2.X ? (x => pt2.Y) : CreateFunc(pt1, pt2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var x = pt1.X; x < pt2.X; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int maxY;Di2015NewLine        int minY = GetRange(line1Func(x), baseFunc(x), out maxY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var y = minY; y <= maxY; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var line2Func = pt2.X == pt3.X ? (x => pt2.Y) : CreateFunc(pt2, pt3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var x = pt2.X; x <= pt3.X; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int maxY;Di2015NewLine        int minY = GetRange(line2Func(x), baseFunc(x), out maxY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var y = minY; y <= maxY; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int GetRange(double y1, double y2, out int maxY)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (y1 < y2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        maxY = (int)Math.Floor(y2);Di2015NewLine        return (int)Math.Ceiling(y1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    maxY = (int)Math.Floor(y1);Di2015NewLine    return (int)Math.Ceiling(y2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Func<int, double> CreateFunc(Point pt1, Point pt2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var y0 = pt1.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (y0 == pt2.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x => y0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var m = (double)(pt2.Y - y0) / (pt2.X - pt1.X);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return x => m * (x - pt1.X) + y0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11080707Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing BackGroundWorker
11080707Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form3 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private BackgroundWorker _worker;Di2015NewLine        BusinessClass _biz = new BusinessClass();Di2015NewLine        public Form3()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            InitWorker();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void InitWorker()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_worker != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _worker.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _worker = new BackgroundWorkerDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WorkerReportsProgress = true,Di2015NewLine                WorkerSupportsCancellation = trueDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            _worker.DoWork += DoWork;Di2015NewLine            _worker.RunWorkerCompleted += RunWorkerCompleted;Di2015NewLine            _worker.ProgressChanged += ProgressChanged;Di2015NewLine            _worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int highestPercentageReached = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (_worker.CancellationPending)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double i = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine                int junk = 0;Di2015NewLine                for (i = 0; i <= 199990000; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int result = _biz.MyFunction(junk);Di2015NewLine                    junk++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Report progress as a percentage of the total task.Di2015NewLine                    var percentComplete = (int)(i / 199990000 * 100);Di2015NewLine                    if (percentComplete > highestPercentageReached)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        highestPercentageReached = percentComplete;Di2015NewLine                        // note I can pass the business class result also and display the same in the LABEL  Di2015NewLine                        _worker.ReportProgress(percentComplete, result);Di2015NewLine                        _worker.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Display some message to the user that task has beenDi2015NewLine                // cancelledDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (e.Error != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Do something with the errorDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label1.Text =  string.Format("Result {0}: Percent {1}",e.UserState, e.ProgressPercentage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BusinessClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int MyFunction(int input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return input+10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11080789Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(Di2015NewLine    HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var taskCompletionSource = new TaskCompletionSource<HttpResponseMessage>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Authorize() returns a startedDi2015NewLine    // task that authenticates the userDi2015NewLine    // if the result is false we shouldDi2015NewLine    // return a 401 immediatelyDi2015NewLine    // otherwise we can invoke the inner handlerDi2015NewLine    Task<bool> authenticationTask = Authorize(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // attach a continuation...Di2015NewLine    authenticationTask.ContinueWith(_ =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (authenticationTask.Result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // authentication succeededDi2015NewLine            // so start the inner handler chainDi2015NewLine            // and write the result to theDi2015NewLine            // task completion source when doneDi2015NewLine            base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine                .ContinueWith(t => taskCompletionSource.SetResult(t.Result));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // authentication failedDi2015NewLine            // so complete the TCS immediatelyDi2015NewLine            taskCompletionSource.SetResult(Di2015NewLine                new HttpResponseMessage(HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return taskCompletionSource.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11080789Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override async Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(Di2015NewLine    HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Authorize still has a Task<bool> return typeDi2015NewLine    // but await allows this nicer inline syntaxDi2015NewLine    var authorized = await Authorize(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!authorized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new HttpResponseMessage(HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Content = new StringContent("Unauthorized.")Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return await base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11092547Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a subkey named Test9999 under HKEY_CURRENT_USER.Di2015NewLine    RegistryKey test9999 = Di2015NewLine        Registry.CurrentUser.CreateSubKey("Test9999");Di2015NewLine    // Create two subkeys under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Test9999. 11101565Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<T> BuildTree<T>(List<T> list, T selectedNode, string keyPropName, string parentPropName, int endLevel = 0, int level = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> entity = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo keyProp = type.GetProperty(keyPropName);Di2015NewLine        string _selectedNodekey = keyProp.GetValue(selectedNode, null).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo parentProp = type.GetProperty(parentPropName);Di2015NewLine        foreach (T item in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string _key = keyProp.GetValue(item, null).ToString();Di2015NewLine            string _parent = parentProp.GetValue(item, null).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_selectedNodekey == _parent)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T obj = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                obj = item;Di2015NewLine                entity.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine                if (level == endLevel && level!=0) break;Di2015NewLine                entity.AddRange(BuildTree<T>(list, obj, keyPropName, parentPropName, level + 1));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return entity;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread.Join
11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorJoin
11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorTimeSpan
11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread.Abort
11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetUptime()
11102398Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static TimeSpan GetUptime()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Try and set the Uptime using per countersDi2015NewLine    var helper = new Helper();Di2015NewLine    var uptimeThread = new Thread(helper.GetPerformanceCounterUptime);Di2015NewLine    uptimeThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If our thread hasn't finished in 5 seconds, perf counters are brokenDi2015NewLine    if (uptimeThread.Join(5 * 1000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return helper._uptime;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        // Kill the thread and use Environment.TickCountDi2015NewLine        uptimeThread.Abort();Di2015NewLine        return TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(Di2015NewLine            Environment.TickCount & Int32.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass HelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal TimeSpan _uptime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This sets the System uptime using the perf countersDi2015NewLine    // this gives the best result but on a system with corrupt perf countersDi2015NewLine    // it can freezeDi2015NewLine    internal void GetPerformanceCounterUptime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var uptime = new PerformanceCounter("System", "System Up Time"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uptime.NextValue();Di2015NewLine            _uptime = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(uptime.NextValue());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11104336Di2015UniqueSeparatorWM_MOUSEWHEEL
11104336Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyRichTextBox : RichTextBox {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern IntPtr SendMessage(Di2015NewLine          IntPtr hWnd,      // handle to destination windowDi2015NewLine          uint Msg,       // messageDi2015NewLine          IntPtr wParam,  // first message parameterDi2015NewLine          IntPtr lParam   // second message parameterDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const uint WM_MOUSEWHEEL = 0x20A;Di2015NewLine    const uint WM_VSCROLL = 0x115;Di2015NewLine    const uint SB_LINEUP = 0;Di2015NewLine    const uint SB_LINEDOWN = 1;Di2015NewLine    const uint SB_THUMBTRACK = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Intercept(ref Message m) {Di2015NewLine        int delta = (int)m.WParam >> 16 & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        if((delta >> 7) == 1) {Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(m.HWnd, WM_VSCROLL, (IntPtr)SB_LINEDOWN, (IntPtr)0);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(m.HWnd, WM_VSCROLL, (IntPtr)SB_LINEUP, (IntPtr)0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m) {Di2015NewLine        switch((uint)m.Msg) {Di2015NewLine            case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:Di2015NewLine                Intercept(ref m);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case WM_VSCROLL:Di2015NewLine                if(((uint)m.WParam & 0xFF) == SB_THUMBTRACK) {Di2015NewLine                    Intercept(ref m);Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    DefWndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                DefWndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11105147Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void ShutdownComputer(bool restart)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ManagementBaseObject mboShutdown = null;Di2015NewLine        ManagementClass mcWin32 = new ManagementClass("Win32_OperatingSystem");Di2015NewLine        mcWin32.Get();        // You can't shutdown without security privilegesDi2015NewLine        mcWin32.Scope.Options.EnablePrivileges = true;Di2015NewLine        ManagementBaseObject mboShutdownParams = mcWin32.GetMethodParameters("Win32Shutdown");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Flag 1 means we want to shut down the system. Use "2" to reboot.Di2015NewLine        mboShutdownParams["Flags"] = restart ? "2" : "1";Di2015NewLine        mboShutdownParams["Reserved"] = "0";Di2015NewLine        foreach (ManagementObject manObj in mcWin32.GetInstances())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mboShutdown = manObj.InvokeMethod("Win32Shutdown", mboShutdownParams, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11106583Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExportToExcelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlProcedure]Di2015NewLinepublic static void ExportQueryResults(string queryText, string worksheetName, string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection cnn = new SqlConnection("context connection=true"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //the temp list to hold the results inDi2015NewLine        List<object[]> results = new List<object[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cnn.Open();Di2015NewLine        //create the sql commandDi2015NewLine        SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(queryText, cnn);Di2015NewLine        using (SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int fieldCount = reader.FieldCount;Di2015NewLine            object[] headers = new object[fieldCount];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < fieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                headers[i] = reader.GetName(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //read the resultsDi2015NewLine            while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object[] values = new object[fieldCount];Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < fieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values[i] = reader[i];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                results.Add(values);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //convert the results into a 2-d array to export into ExcelDi2015NewLine            object[,] exportVals = new object[results.Count, fieldCount];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int row = 0; row < results.Count; row++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int col = 0; col < fieldCount; col++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    exportVals[row, col] = results[row][col];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Excel.Application _app = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine            Excel.Workbook _book = _app.Workbooks.Add(Missing.Value);Di2015NewLine            Excel.Worksheet _sheet = (Excel.Worksheet)_book.ActiveSheet;Di2015NewLine            Excel.Range _range = (Excel.Range)_sheet.Cells[1, 1];Di2015NewLine            _app.DisplayAlerts = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set the headers and freeze the panesDi2015NewLine            _range = _sheet.get_Range(_sheet.Cells[1, 1], _sheet.Cells[1, fieldCount]);Di2015NewLine            _range.NumberFormat = "@";Di2015NewLine            _range.HorizontalAlignment = Excel.XlHAlign.xlHAlignLeft;Di2015NewLine            _range.Value2 = headers;Di2015NewLine            _range.Font.Bold = true;Di2015NewLine            _range = _sheet.get_Range(_sheet.Cells[2, 1], _sheet.Cells[2, 1]);Di2015NewLine            _range.EntireRow.Select();Di2015NewLine            _range.Application.ActiveWindow.FreezePanes = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _range = _sheet.get_Range(_sheet.Cells[2, 1], _sheet.Cells[results.Count, fieldCount]);Di2015NewLine            _range.Value2 = exportVals;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _range = _sheet.get_Range(_sheet.Cells[1, 1], _sheet.Cells[exportVals.Length, fieldCount]);Di2015NewLine            _range.AutoFilter(1, Type.Missing, Excel.XlAutoFilterOperator.xlAnd, Type.Missing, true);Di2015NewLine            _sheet.Cells.Columns.AutoFit();Di2015NewLine            _sheet.Range["A1"].Select();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _sheet.Name = worksheetName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //remove any extra worksheetsDi2015NewLine            foreach (Excel.Worksheet sht in _book.Worksheets)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sht.Name != worksheetName)Di2015NewLine                    sht.Delete();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _book.SaveAs(fileNameDi2015NewLine                , Excel.XlFileFormat.xlExcel5Di2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , falseDi2015NewLine                , falseDi2015NewLine                , Excel.XlSaveAsAccessMode.xlNoChangeDi2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , Missing.ValueDi2015NewLine                , Missing.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //_book.Close(Missing.Value, Missing.Value, Missing.Value);Di2015NewLine            _app.Application.Quit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine            GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Marshal.ReleaseComObject(_range);Di2015NewLine 11107837Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlNode.Name
11107837Di2015UniqueSeparatorString
11107837Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static String UpdateNodesWithDefaultNamespace(String xml, String defaultNamespace)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(xml) && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(defaultNamespace))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (currentIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //find index of tag opening characterDi2015NewLine                int tagOpenIndex = xml.IndexOf('<', currentIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //no more tag openings are foundDi2015NewLine                if (tagOpenIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //if it's a closing tagDi2015NewLine                if (xml[tagOpenIndex + 1] == '/')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentIndex = tagOpenIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentIndex = tagOpenIndex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //find corresponding tag closing characterDi2015NewLine                int tagCloseIndex = xml.IndexOf('>', tagOpenIndex);Di2015NewLine                if (tagCloseIndex <= tagOpenIndex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Invalid XML file.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //look for a colon within currently processed tagDi2015NewLine                String currentTagSubstring = xml.Substring(tagOpenIndex, tagCloseIndex - tagOpenIndex);Di2015NewLine                int firstSpaceIndex = currentTagSubstring.IndexOf(' ');Di2015NewLine                int nameSpaceColonIndex;Di2015NewLine                //if space was foundDi2015NewLine                if (firstSpaceIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //look for namespace colon between tag open character and the first space characterDi2015NewLine                    nameSpaceColonIndex = currentTagSubstring.IndexOf(':', 0, firstSpaceIndex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //look for namespace colon between tag open character and tag close characterDi2015NewLine                    nameSpaceColonIndex = currentTagSubstring.IndexOf(':');Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //if there is no namespaceDi2015NewLine                if (nameSpaceColonIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //insert namespace after tag opening characters '<' or '</'Di2015NewLine                    xml = xml.Insert(currentIndex + 1, String.Format("{0}:", defaultNamespace));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //look for next tags after current tag closing characterDi2015NewLine                currentIndex = tagCloseIndex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return xml;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11108480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FileUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void CopyMultiple(string sourceFilePath, params string[] destinationPaths)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(sourceFilePath)) throw new ArgumentException("A source file must be specified.", "sourceFilePath");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (destinationPaths == null || destinationPaths.Length == 0) throw new ArgumentException("At least one destination file must be specified.", "destinationPaths");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Parallel.ForEach(destinationPaths, new ParallelOptions(),Di2015NewLine                         destinationPath =>Di2015NewLine                             {Di2015NewLine                                 using (var source = new FileStream(sourceFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read))Di2015NewLine                                 using (var destination = new FileStream(destinationPath, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine                                 {Di2015NewLine                                     var buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine                                     int read;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                     while ((read = source.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                                     {Di2015NewLine                                         destination.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine                                     }Di2015NewLine                                 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                             });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11108600Di2015UniqueSeparator // Check for lines that are a key-value pair, separated by whitespace.Di2015NewLine// Note that value is optionalDi2015NewLinestatic string partPattern = @"^(?<Key>\\w*)(\\s+(?<Value>\\.*))?$";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, string>> ReadParts(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = File.OpenText(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Ignore lines that just contain whitespaceDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(line)) continue; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This is a new replicate block, start a new dictionaryDi2015NewLine            if (line.Trim().CompareTo("REPLICATE") == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return parseReplicateBlock(reader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IDictionary<string, string> parseReplicateBlock(StreamReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Make sure we have an opening braceDi2015NewLine    VerifyOpening(reader);Di2015NewLine    string line;Di2015NewLine    var currentDictionary = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ignore lines that just contain whitespaceDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(line)) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        line = line.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since our regex used groupings (?<Key> and ?<Value>), Di2015NewLine        // we can do a match and check to see if our groupings Di2015NewLine        // found anything. If they did, extract the key and value. Di2015NewLine        Match m = Regex.Match(line, partPattern);Di2015NewLine        if (m.Groups["Key"].Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentDictionary.Add(m.Groups["Key"].Value, m.Groups["Value"].Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (line.CompareTo("}") == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return currentDictionary;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // We exited the loop before we found a closing brace, throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine    throw new ApplicationException("Missing closing brace");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void VerifyOpening(StreamReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string line;Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ignore lines that just contain whitespaceDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(line)) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (line.Trim().CompareTo("{") == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Missing opening brace");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new ApplicationException("Missing opening brace");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

static void CommandChanged(DependencyObject target, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Control control = target as Control;Di2015NewLine        if (control != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((e.NewValue != null) && (e.OldValue == null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                control.MouseDown += OnMouseDown;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if ((e.NewValue == null) && (e.OldValue != null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                control.MouseDown -= {Di2015NewLine        Control control = sender as Control;Di2015NewLine        ICommand command = (ICommand)control.GetValue(CommandProperty);Di2015NewLine        object commandParameter = 11110536Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Trim(Char[] str) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int maxI = 0; // an optimisaiton so it doesn't iterate through chars already encounteredDi2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<str.Length;i++) {Di2015NewLine        if( Char.IsWhitespace( str[i] ) ) str[i] = '\\0';Di2015NewLine        else { maxI = i; break };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i=str.Length-1;i>maxI;i--) {Di2015NewLine        if( Char.IsWhitespace( str[i] ) ) str[i] = '\\0';Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11114801Di2015UniqueSeparatorMap
11114801Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic HashMap<String, Integer> countWords(String str) {Di2015NewLine    HashMap<String, Integer> counts = new HashMap<String, Integer>();Di2015NewLine    for(String s : str.split("\\\\s+")) {Di2015NewLine        if(!s.isEmpty()) {Di2015NewLine            if(counts.containsKey(s)) {Di2015NewLine                counts.put(s, counts.get(s) + 1);Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                counts.put(s, 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return counts;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString s1 = "some filename contains few words.txt";Di2015NewLineString s2 = "some filename not contains few words.txt";Di2015NewLineHashMap<String, Integer> s1Counts = countWords(s1);Di2015NewLineHashMap<String, Integer> s2Counts = countWords(s2);Di2015NewLine// assume s1 is "master" string, count the total number of wordsDi2015NewLineint s1Total = 0, s2Total = 0;Di2015NewLinefor(Integer i : s1Counts.values()) {Di2015NewLine    s1Total += i;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// iterate over words in s1, find the number of matching words in s2Di2015NewLinefor(Map.Entry<String, Integer> entry : s1Counts.entrySet()) {Di2015NewLine    if(s2Counts.containsKey(entry.getKey())) {Di2015NewLine        if(s2Counts.get(entry.getKey()) >= entry.getValue()) {Di2015NewLine            s2Total += entry.getValue();Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            s2Total += s2Counts.get(entry.getKey());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// resultDi2015NewLineSystem.out.println(s2Total + " out of " + s1Total + " words match.");Di2015NewLine

11115066Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static readonly int Bgr32BytesPerPixel = (PixelFormats.Bgr32.BitsPerPixel + 7) / 8;Di2015NewLine    private byte[] pixelData;Di2015NewLine    private WriteableBitmap CameraSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ColorImageReady(object sender, ColorImageFrameReadyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           bool receivedData = false;Di2015NewLine            using (ColorImageFrame imageFrame = e.OpenColorImageFrame())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (imageFrame != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (pixelData == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        this.pixelData = new byte[imageFrame.PixelDataLength];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    imageFrame.CopyPixelDataTo(this.pixelData);Di2015NewLine                    receivedData = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // A WriteableBitmap is a WPF construct that enables resetting the Bits of the image.Di2015NewLine                    // This is more efficient than creating a new Bitmap every frame.Di2015NewLine                    if (receivedData)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    this.CameraSource.WritePixels(Di2015NewLine                        new Int32Rect(0, 0, imageFrame.Width, imageFrame.Height),Di2015NewLine                        this.pixelData,Di2015NewLine                        imageFrame.Width * Bgr32BytesPerPixel,Di2015NewLine                        0);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11116021Di2015UniqueSeparator//load the 4-byte integer 0 on to the stackDi2015NewLineIL_0001:    ldc.i4.0Di2015NewLine//set the value of local 0 (x) to the previous value on the stack (0)Di2015NewLineIL_0002:    stloc.0Di2015NewLine//load up x for the comparisonDi2015NewLineIL_0003:    ldloc.0Di2015NewLine//load the 4-byte integer 0x14 (20) on to the stackDi2015NewLineIL_0004:    ldc.i4.s    14Di2015NewLine//check to see whether two elements back on the stack is greater than one element back on the stack (x > 20), push 1 one back on the stack in the case the first is greater, 0 otherwiseDi2015NewLineIL_0005:    cgtDi2015NewLine//if 0x14 (20) was the greater (or equal) value, jump over the body of the if blockDi2015NewLineIL_0006:    brfalse.s    IL_0009Di2015NewLine//load the 4-byte integer 1 (1) on to the stackDi2015NewLineIL_0007:    ldc.i4.1Di2015NewLine//set the value of local 0 (x) to the previous value on the stack (1)Di2015NewLineIL_0008:    stloc.0Di2015NewLine//load the value of local 0 (x) on to the stackDi2015NewLineIL_0009:    ldloc.0Di2015NewLine//call Console.WriteLineDi2015NewLineIL_000A:    call    System.Console.WriteLineDi2015NewLine

11121866Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class InterfaceEventsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<EventData> List = new List<EventData>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Resolve()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (List.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = List.Count - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (List[i].EventType == List[0].EventType && List[i].Sender.Intersects(List[0].Sender))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (List[i].Sender.Layer < List[0].Layer) // However you choose to manage it.Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        List[0] = List[i];Di2015NewLine                        List.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        List.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Toggle event from List[0]Di2015NewLine            List.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct EventDataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public InterfaceComponent Sender;Di2015NewLine    public int EventType;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
