11122493Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets all images inside a FolderDi2015NewLine    /// and triggers OCR on each..Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="directoryPath"> Path to Folder </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns> Text </returns>        Di2015NewLine    public string CheckFileAndDoOCR(string directoryPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string TheTxt = "";Di2015NewLine        IEnumerator files = Directory.GetFiles(directoryPath).GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (files.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // FileInfoDi2015NewLine            FileInfo foo = new FileInfo(Convert.ToString(files.Current));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check for JPG File FormatDi2015NewLine            if (foo.Extension == ".jpg" || foo.Extension == ".JPG")Di2015NewLine            // or // ImageFormat.Jpeg.ToString()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Start OCR ProcedureDi2015NewLine                TheTxt = DoOCR(foo.FullName);Di2015NewLine                // Create TXT file next to ImageFileDi2015NewLine                string txtFileName = foo.DirectoryName + "\\\\" + foo.Name.Replace(foo.Extension,"") + ".txt";Di2015NewLine                FileStream createFile = new FileStream(txtFileName, FileMode.OpenOrCreate);Di2015NewLine                // Save the text in to TXT fileDi2015NewLine                StreamWriter writeFile = new StreamWriter(createFile);Di2015NewLine                writeFile.Write(TheTxt);Di2015NewLine                // CloseDi2015NewLine                writeFile.Close();Di2015NewLine                createFile.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Delete used pictures (Optional)Di2015NewLine            /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine            try Di2015NewLine            { foo.Delete(); }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            { Logger(LogPath, "| Exception: Source[" + ex.Source + "] Message[" + ex.Message + Di2015NewLine                "] InnerException[" + ex.InnerException + "] StackTrace[" + ex.StackTrace + "] | "); }Di2015NewLine            /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return TheTxt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // DoOCRDi2015NewLine    // Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Start an OCR scan on given ImageFileDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="FullPath"> Path to ImageFile </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns> Text </returns>Di2015NewLine    public string DoOCR(string FullPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string txt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // OCR Operations...Di2015NewLine        MODI.Document md = new MODI.Document(); // Create MODI.DocumentDi2015NewLine        md.Create(FullPath); // Fill MODI.Document with my fileDi2015NewLine        // Showprogress of OCRDi2015NewLine        md.OnOCRProgress += new MODI._IDocumentEvents_OnOCRProgressEventHandler(this.ShowProgress);Di2015NewLine        // Begin OCRDi2015NewLine        md.OCR(MODI.MiLANGUAGES.miLANG_ENGLISH, false, false); // OCR();Di2015NewLine        // Image from fileDi2015NewLine        MODI.Image image = (MODI.Image)md.Images[0];Di2015NewLine        txt = image.Layout.Text;Di2015NewLine        // Optionally you can get only first word by using word.TextDi2015NewLine        /// Words from Image :Di2015NewLine        // MODI.Word word = image.Layout.Words[0];Di2015NewLine        /// Text from first Word :Di2015NewLine        // txt = word.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Close OCRDi2015NewLine        word = null;Di2015NewLine        image = null;Di2015NewLine        md.Close(false);Di2015NewLine        md = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // FinalizeDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return TextDi2015NewLine        return txt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11123134Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubscribe/Unsubscribe
11123134Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceContract(SessionMode = SessionMode.Required,Di2015NewLine    CallbackContract = typeof(IProcessorCallBack))]Di2015NewLinepublic interface IProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine    Boolean SubscribeToEvents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [OperationContract]Di2015NewLine    Boolean UnsubscribeToEvents();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IProcessorCallBackDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [OperationContract(IsOneWay = true)]Di2015NewLine    void OnEvent(EventArgs args);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode = InstanceContextMode.Single, ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Multiple)]Di2015NewLinepublic class DDSpeechMikeProcessor:IProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<IProcessorCallBack> _eventListeners = Di2015NewLine        new List<IProcessorCallBack>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool SubscribeToEvents()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var listenerToCallBacks =    Di2015NewLine            OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IProcessorCallBack>();Di2015NewLine        if(!_eventListeners.Contains(listenerToCallBacks))Di2015NewLine            _eventListeners.Add(listenerToCallBacks);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool UnsubscribeToEvents()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var listenerToCallBacks = Di2015NewLine            OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IProcessorCallBack>();Di2015NewLine        if (_eventListeners.Contains(listenerToCallBacks))Di2015NewLine            _eventListeners.Remove(listenerToCallBacks);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This is your server listening for the main eventDi2015NewLine    //which it will pass on to all listenersDi2015NewLine    void OnEvent(EventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(var listener in _eventListeners)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                listener.OnEvent(args);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RemoveListenerIfBadCommunication(listener, exception);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If a listener did not unsubscribe before shutting down you will get exceptionsDi2015NewLine    private void RemoveListenerIfBadCommunication(IProcessorCallBack listener, Di2015NewLine        Exception exception)Di2015NewLine 11126473Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetMyTable<T>(IEnumerable<T> list, params  Expression<Func<T, object>>[] fxns)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new -->\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("<TR>\\n");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var fxn in fxns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("<TD>");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(fxn.Compile()(item));Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("</TD>");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("</TR>\\n");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("</TABLE>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string DescriptionAttribute;Di2015NewLine        if (d != null) return d.Description;Di2015NewLine        return propertInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return "?-?";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11128763Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IDictionary<string, List<string>> ParseFile(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, List<string>> queries = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = File.OpenText(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (parseQuery(reader, queries)) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return queries;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool parseQuery(StreamReader reader, Dictionary<string, List<string>> queries)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sbQuery = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sbArgs = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    // Read in queryDi2015NewLine    bool moreLines = ParseBlock(reader, sbQuery);Di2015NewLine    if (moreLines)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (moreLines)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            // Check for the beginning of an args block.Di2015NewLine            if (line != null && line.StartsWith("-->"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Read in argsDi2015NewLine                sbArgs.Append(line);Di2015NewLine                moreLines = ParseBlock(reader, sbArgs);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // If this is not an args block, it is a new queryDi2015NewLine            // Save the last query and start overDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddQuery(queries, sbQuery.ToString(), sbArgs.ToString());Di2015NewLine                sbQuery = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                sbQuery.Append(line); // Make sure we capture the last lineDi2015NewLine                moreLines = ParseBlock(reader, sbQuery);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    AddQuery(queries, sbQuery.ToString(), sbArgs.ToString());Di2015NewLine    return moreLines;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool ParseBlock(StreamReader reader, StringBuilder builder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string line;Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        line = line.Trim();Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(line)) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.Append(line + " ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return line != null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void AddQuery(Dictionary<string, List<string>> queries, string query, string args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (query.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> lstParams;Di2015NewLine        if (!queries.TryGetValue(query, out lstParams))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lstParams = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lstParams.Add(args);Di2015NewLine        queries[query] = lstParams;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11128792Di2015UniqueSeparator[WebMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic static AjaxReturnObject SubmitWager(string token, string track, string race,   string amount, string pool, string runners)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var serviceReturn = Services.Account.SubmitWager("", track, race, pool, amount, runners);Di2015NewLine    return new AjaxReturnObject(serviceReturn.AccountToken, serviceReturn.Payload);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (CustomServiceException<string> e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new AjaxReturnObject(0, e.Message();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11129244Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DocWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private const int _exceptionLimit = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // should be a singleton instance of wrapper for WordDi2015NewLine  // the code below assumes this was set beforehandDi2015NewLine  // (e.g. from another helper method)Di2015NewLine  private static Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application _app;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public virtual void PrintToSpecificPrinter(string fileName, string printer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Sometimes Word fails, so needs to be restarted.Di2015NewLine    // Sometimes it's not Word's fault.Di2015NewLine    // Either way, having this in a retry-loop is more robust.Di2015NewLine    for (int retry = 0; retry < _exceptionLimit; retry++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (TryOncePrintToSpecificPrinter(fileName, printer))Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (retry == _exceptionLimit - 1) // this was our last chanceDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // if it didn't have actual exceptions, but was not able to change the printer, we should notify somebody:Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Failed to change printer.");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool TryOncePrintToSpecificPrinter(string fileName, string printer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document doc = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      doc = OpenDocument(fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (!SetActivePrinter(printer))Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Print(doc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return true; // we did what we wanted to do hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (retry == _exceptionLimit)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Word printing failed.", e);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      // restart Word, remembering to keep an appropriate delay between Quit and Start.Di2015NewLine      // this should really be handled by wrapper classesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (doc != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // release your doc (COM) object and do whatever other cleanup you needDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Print(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document doc)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // do the actual printing:Di2015NewLine    doc.Activate();Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1)); // emperical testing found this to be sufficient for our systemDi2015NewLine    // (a delay may not be required for you if you are printing only one document at a time)Di2015NewLine    doc.PrintOut(/* ref objects */);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool SetActivePrinter(string printer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string oldPrinter = GetActivePrinter(doc); // save this if you want to preserve the existing "default"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (printer == null)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (oldPrinter != printer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // conditionally change the default printer ...Di2015NewLine      // we found it inefficient to change the default printer if we don't have to. YMMV.Di2015NewLine      doc.Application.ActivePrinter = printer;Di2015NewLine      Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5)); // emperical testing found this to be sufficient for our systemDi2015NewLine      if (GetActivePrinter(doc) != printer)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // don't quit-and-restart Word, this one actually isn't Word's fault -- just try againDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // successful printer switch! (as near as anyone can tell)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document OpenDocument(string fileName)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return _app.Documents.Open(ref fileName, /* other refs */);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private string GetActivePrinter(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document doc)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string activePrinter = doc.Application.ActivePrinter;Di2015NewLine    int onIndex = activePrinter.LastIndexOf(" on ");Di2015NewLine    if (onIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      activePrinter = activePrinter.Substring(0, onIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return activePrinter;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11132163Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.ServiceModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Timers;Di2015NewLineusing System.ServiceModel.Description;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WcfConsoleApplicationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ServiceContract]Di2015NewLine    public interface ITimerCallbackTargetDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract(IsOneWay = true)]Di2015NewLine        void OnTimeElapsed(int someInfo);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ServiceContract]Di2015NewLine    public interface ITimerServiceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [OperationContract(IsOneWay = true)]Di2015NewLine        void Subscribe(string address);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode = InstanceContextMode.Single,Di2015NewLine                     ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Single)]Di2015NewLine    public class TimerService : ITimerServiceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Timer _timer = new Timer(2000);Di2015NewLine        private ChannelFactory<ITimerCallbackTarget> _channelFac;Di2015NewLine        private int _dataToSend = 99;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Subscribe(string address)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // note: You can also load a configured endpoint by name from app.config here,Di2015NewLine            //       and still change the address at runtime in code.Di2015NewLine            _channelFac = new ChannelFactory<ITimerCallbackTarget>(new BasicHttpBinding(), address);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _timer.Elapsed += (p1, p2) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ITimerCallbackTarget callback = _channelFac.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine                callback.OnTimeElapsed(_dataToSend++);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ((ICommunicationObject)callback).Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // By not keeping the channel open any longer than needed to make a single callDi2015NewLine                // there's no risk of timeouts, disposed objects, etc.Di2015NewLine                // Caching the channel factory is not required, but gives a measurable performance gain.Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode = InstanceContextMode.Single,Di2015NewLine                     ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Single)]Di2015NewLine    public class TimerClient : ITimerCallbackTargetDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void OnTimeElapsed(int someInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Got Info: " + someInfo);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ServiceHost hostTimerService = new ServiceHost(typeof(TimerService), new Uri("http://localhost:8080/TimerService"));Di2015NewLine            ServiceHost hostTimerClient = new ServiceHost(typeof(TimerClient), new Uri("http://localhost:8080/TimerClient"));Di2015NewLine            ChannelFactory<ITimerService> proxyFactory = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // start the servicesDi2015NewLine                hostTimerService.Open();Di2015NewLine                hostTimerClient.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // subscribe to ITimerServiceDi2015NewLine                proxyFactory = new ChannelFactory<ITimerService>(new BasicHttpBinding(), "http://localhost:8080/TimerService");Di2015NewLine                ITimerService timerService = proxyFactory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine                timerService.Subscribe("http://localhost:8080/TimerClient");Di2015NewLine                ((ICommunicationObject)timerService).Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // wait for call backs...Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Wait for Elapsed updates. Press enter to exit.");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hostTimerService.Close();Di2015NewLine                hostTimerClient.Close();Di2015NewLine                proxyFactory.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11133227Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly string[] Bits = { Di2015NewLine        "small string",Di2015NewLine        "string which is a bit longer",Di2015NewLine        "stirng which is longer again to force yet another copy with any luck"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static readonly int ExpectedLength = string.Join("", Bits).Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()        Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Time(StringBuilderTest);Di2015NewLine        Time(ConcatenateTest);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Time(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        // Make sure it's JITtedDi2015NewLine        action();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; 11134320Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void TaskSpin(TaskScheduler uiScheduler, Di2015NewLine                      Func<TaskScheduler, object[], bool> asyncMethod, Di2015NewLine                      object[] methodParameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task asyncTask = Task.Factory.StartNew<bool>(() => Di2015NewLine            asyncMethod(uiScheduler, methodParameters));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Callback for finish/cancellation.Di2015NewLine        asyncTask.ContinueWith(task =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check task status.Di2015NewLine            switch (task.Status)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Handle any exceptions to prevent UnobservedTaskException.             Di2015NewLine                case TaskStatus.RanToCompletion:Di2015NewLine                    if (asyncTask.Result)Di2015NewLine                        UpdateUI(uiScheduler, "OK");Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string strErrComplete = "Process failed.";Di2015NewLine                        UpdateUI(uiScheduler, strErrComplete);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case TaskStatus.Faulted:Di2015NewLine                    string strFatalErr = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    UpdateUI(uiScheduler, "Fatal Error);Di2015NewLine                    if (task.Exception != null)Di2015NewLine                        strFatalErr = task.Exception.InnerException.Message;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        strFatalErr = "Operation failed";Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show(strFatalErr);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            asyncTask.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }, TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception eX)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Utils.ErrMsg(eX.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11142999Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CompanyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private string name;Di2015NewLine  private int id; Di2015NewLine  private string city;Di2015NewLine  private string state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public string Name { get { return name; } }Di2015NewLine  public int Id  { get { return id; } } Di2015NewLine  public string City { get { return city; } }Di2015NewLine  public string State { get { return state; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Company(string name, int id, string city, string state) Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.name = name;Di2015NewLine    this.id = id;Di2015NewLine    this.city = city;Di2015NewLine    this.state = state; Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override string ToString() Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Create a formatted string from the fields here, for example:Di2015NewLine    return name + " " + id + " " + city + " " + state;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Company FromLine(string line)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Extract the fields from a line, and post-process the fields here, for example:Di2015NewLine    string[] tokens = line.Split(separators);Di2015NewLine    string name = tokens[0].Trim();Di2015NewLine    int id = Convert.ToInt32(tokens[1]);Di2015NewLine    string city = tokens[2];Di2015NewLine    string state = tokens[3];Di2015NewLine    return new Company(name, id, city, state);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11143110Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource Last<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return list[count - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TSource current;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw Error.NoElements();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11145719Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomAuthorize : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Permissions { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IAccountRepository AccountRepository { get; set; }        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string[] permArray { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string reqStatus { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomAuthorize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.AccountRepository = new UserModel();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override bool AuthorizeCore(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.AuthorizeCore(httpContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Permissions != null) {Di2015NewLine            permArray = Permissions.Trim().Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (AccountRepository.isEnabled(httpContext.User.Identity.Name)) {Di2015NewLine                this.reqStatus = "permission";Di2015NewLine                return AccountRepository.hasPermissions(permArray);                     Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            return AccountRepository.isEnabled(httpContext.User.Identity.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void HandleUnauthorizedRequest(AuthorizationContext filterContext) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.reqStatus == "permission") {Di2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new RedirectResult(MvcApplication.eM.cause("no_permission", "redirect"));Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            base.HandleUnauthorizedRequest(filterContext);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11151936Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClientKeyboardController : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>Di2015NewLine    /// Set this property to SetAutoHideKeyboard(DependencyObject obj, bool value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        obj.SetValue(AutoHideKeyboardProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handler for the AutoShowKeyboard dependency property being changed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="d">Object the property is applied to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Change args</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void AutoShowKeyboardPropertyChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxBase textBox = d as TextBoxBase;Di2015NewLine        if (null != textBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((e.NewValue as bool?).GetValueOrDefault(false))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.GotKeyboardFocus += OnGotKeyboardFocus;Di2015NewLine                textBox.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown += OnMouseLeftButtonDown;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.GotKeyboardFocus -= OnGotKeyboardFocus;Di2015NewLine                textBox.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown -= OnMouseLeftButtonDown;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handler for the AutoHideKeyboard dependency property being changed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="d">Object the property is applied to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Change args</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void AutoHideKeyboardPropertyChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxBase textBox = d as TextBoxBase;Di2015NewLine        if (null != textBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((e.NewValue as bool?).GetValueOrDefault(false))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.LostKeyboardFocus += OnLostKeyboardFocus;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBox.LostKeyboardFocus -= OnLostKeyboardFocus;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Left click handler. We handle left clicks to ensure the text box gets focus, and ifDi2015NewLine    /// it already has focus we reshow the keyboard. This means a user can reshow theDi2015NewLine    /// keyboard when the text box already has focus, i.e. they don't have to swap focus toDi2015NewLine    /// another control and then back to the text box.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The text box that was clicked on.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">The left mouse click event arguments.</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxBase textBox = sender as TextBoxBase;Di2015NewLine        if (null != textBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (textBox.IsKeyboardFocusWithin)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // TODO: Show on-screen keyboardDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Ensure focus is set to the text box - the focus handler will then show theDi2015NewLine                // keyboard.Di2015NewLine                textBox.Focus();Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Got focus handler. Displays the client keyboard.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The text box that received keyboard focus.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">The got focus event arguments.</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void OnGotKeyboardFocus(object sender, KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxBase textBox = e.OriginalSource as TextBoxBase;Di2015NewLine        if (textBox != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // TODO: Show on-screen keyboardDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Lost focus handler. Hides the client keyboard. However we skip hiding if the newDi2015NewLine    /// element that gains focus has got the auto-show keyboard attached property set toDi2015NewLine    /// true. This prevents screen glitching from quickly showing/hiding the keyboard.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The text box that lost keyboard focus.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">The lost focus event arguments.</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void OnLostKeyboardFocus(object sender, KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxBase textBox = e.OriginalSource as TextBoxBase;Di2015NewLine        if (textBox != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool skipHide = false;Di2015NewLine            if (e.NewFocus is DependencyObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                skipHide = GetAutoShowKeyboard(e.NewFocus as DependencyObject);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!skipHide && ClientKeyboardController.CmpInput != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // TODO: Hide on-screen keyboard.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Keep it clean.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LoggerImpl : ILoggerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void LogMessage(string message, Di2015NewLine        LogLevel level, ILoggableCompany company)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // implementationDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Property only part of the implementation.Di2015NewLine    public string LogName {get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The parent contains information about the type in Di2015NewLine// which ILogger is injected.Di2015NewLinecontainer.RegisterWithContext<ILogger>(parent =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Retrieve a new LoggerImpl instance from the container Di2015NewLine    // to allow this type to be auto-wired.Di2015NewLine    var logger = container.GetInstance<LoggerImpl>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ImplementationType is null when ILogger isDi2015NewLine    // requested directly (using GetInstance<ILogger>())Di2015NewLine    // since it will have no parent in that case.Di2015NewLine    if (parent.ImplementationType != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Set the LogName with the name of the class Di2015NewLine        // it is injected into.Di2015NewLine        logger.LogName = parent.ImplementationType.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return logger;Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Register the LoggerImpl as transient. 11152658Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ClickThroughXNADi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Directx graphics deviceDi2015NewLine        GraphicsDevice dev = null;        Di2015NewLine        BasicEffect effect = null;     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wheel vertexesDi2015NewLine        VertexPositionColor[] v = new VertexPositionColor[100];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wheel rotationDi2015NewLine        float rot = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StartPosition = FormStartPosition.CenterScreen;   Di2015NewLine            Size = new System.Drawing.Size(500, 500);Di2015NewLine            FormBorderStyle = System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.None;  // no bordersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TopMost = true;        // make the form always on top                     Di2015NewLine            Visible = true;        // Important! if this isn't set, then the form is not shown at allDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the form click-throughDi2015NewLine            int initialStyle = GetWindowLong(this.Handle, -20);Di2015NewLine            SetWindowLong(this.Handle, -20, initialStyle | 0x80000 | 0x20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create device presentation parametersDi2015NewLine            PresentationParameters p = new PresentationParameters();Di2015NewLine            p.IsFullScreen = false;Di2015NewLine            p.DeviceWindowHandle = this.Handle;Di2015NewLine            p.BackBufferFormat = SurfaceFormat.Vector4;Di2015NewLine            p.PresentationInterval = PresentInterval.One;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create XNA graphics deviceDi2015NewLine            dev = new GraphicsDevice(GraphicsAdapter.DefaultAdapter, GraphicsProfile.Reach, p);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Init basic effectDi2015NewLine            effect = new BasicEffect(dev);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Extend aero glass style on form initDi2015NewLine            OnResize(null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnResize(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] margins = new int[] { 0, 0, Width, Height };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Extend aero glass style to whole formDi2015NewLine            DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea(this.Handle, ref margins);  Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnPaintBackground(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do nothing here to stop window normal background paintingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            // Clear device with fully transparent blackDi2015NewLine            dev.Clear(new Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color(0, 0, 0, 0.0f));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Rotate wheel a bitDi2015NewLine            rot+=0.1f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make the wheel vertexes and colors for vertexesDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < v.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {                    Di2015NewLine                if (i % 3 == 1)Di2015NewLine                    v[i].Position = new Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector3((float)Math.Sin((i + rot) * (Math.PI * 2f / (float)v.Length)), (float)Math.Cos((i + rot) * (Math.PI * 2f / (float)v.Length)), 0);Di2015NewLine                else if (i % 3 == 2)Di2015NewLine                    v[i].Position = new Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector3((float)Math.Sin((i + 2 + rot) * (Math.PI * 2f / (float)v.Length)), (float)Math.Cos((i + 2 + rot) * (Math.PI * 2f / (float)v.Length)), 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                v[i].Color = new Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color(1 - (i / (float)v.Length), i / (float)v.Length, 0, i / (float)v.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Enable position colored vertex renderingDi2015NewLine            effect.VertexColorEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine            foreach (EffectPass pass in effect.CurrentTechnique.Passes) pass.Apply();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the primitives (the wheel)Di2015NewLine            dev.DrawUserPrimitives(PrimitiveType.TriangleList, v, 0, v.Length / 3, VertexPositionColor.VertexDeclaration);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Present the device contents into formDi2015NewLine            dev.Present();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Redraw immediatilyDi2015NewLine            Invalidate();            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern int GetWindowLong(IntPtr hWnd, int nIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        static extern int SetWindowLong(IntPtr hWnd, int nIndex, int dwNewLong);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("dwmapi.dll")]Di2015NewLine        static extern void DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea(IntPtr hWnd, ref int[] pMargins);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11153937Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TResult Lift<T, TResult>(this T target, Expression<Func<T, TResult>> exp)Di2015NewLine    where TResult : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (TResult) GetValueOfExpression(target, exp.Body);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object GetValueOfExpression<T>(T target, Expression exp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = (MemberExpression) exp;Di2015NewLine        var parentValue = GetValueOfExpression(target, memberExpression.Expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parentValue == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (memberExpression.Member is PropertyInfo)Di2015NewLine                return ((PropertyInfo) memberExpression.Member).GetValue(parentValue, null);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return ((FieldInfo) memberExpression.Member).GetValue(parentValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The expression must contain only member access calls.", "exp");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11153937Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static object GetValueOfExpression<T>(T target, Expression exp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (exp == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((ConstantExpression) exp).Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Lambda)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return exp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = (MemberExpression) exp;Di2015NewLine        var parentValue = GetValueOfExpression(target, memberExpression.Expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parentValue == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (memberExpression.Member is PropertyInfo)Di2015NewLine                return ((PropertyInfo) memberExpression.Member).GetValue(parentValue, null);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return ((FieldInfo) memberExpression.Member).GetValue(parentValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Call)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodCallExpression = (MethodCallExpression) exp;Di2015NewLine        var parentValue = GetValueOfExpression(target, methodCallExpression.Object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parentValue == null && !methodCallExpression.Method.IsStatic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var arguments = methodCallExpression.Arguments.Select(a => GetValueOfExpression(target, a)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Required for comverting expression parameters to delegate callsDi2015NewLine            var parameters = methodCallExpression.Method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (typeof(Delegate).IsAssignableFrom(parameters[i].ParameterType))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    arguments[i] = ((LambdaExpression) arguments[i]).Compile();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (arguments.Length > 0 && arguments[0] == null && methodCallExpression.Method.IsStatic &&Di2015NewLine                methodCallExpression.Method.IsDefined(typeof(ExtensionAttribute), false)) // extension methodDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return methodCallExpression.Method.Invoke(parentValue, arguments);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine 11155102Di2015UniqueSeparator// This presumes that weeks start with Monday.Di2015NewLine// Week 1 is the 1st week of the year with a Thursday in it.Di2015NewLinepublic static int GetIso8601WeekOfYear(DateTime time)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Seriously cheat.  If its Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday, then it'll Di2015NewLine    // be the same week# as whatever Thursday, Friday or Saturday are,Di2015NewLine    // and we always get those rightDi2015NewLine    DayOfWeek day = CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.Calendar.GetDayOfWeek(time);Di2015NewLine    if (day >= DayOfWeek.Monday && day <= DayOfWeek.Wednesday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        time = time.AddDays(3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the week of our adjusted dayDi2015NewLine    return CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear(time, CalendarWeekRule.FirstFourDayWeek, DayOfWeek.Monday);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

11157996Di2015UniqueSeparatorProtected Sub ExportToPDF(gvReport As GridView, LandScape As Boolean)Di2015NewLineDim noOfColumns As Integer = 0, noOfRows As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDim tbl As DataTable = NothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIf gvReport.AutoGenerateColumns ThenDi2015NewLine    tbl = TryCast(gvReport.DataSource, DataTable)Di2015NewLine    ' Gets the DataSource of the GridView Control.Di2015NewLine    noOfColumns = tbl.Columns.CountDi2015NewLine    noOfRows = tbl.Rows.CountDi2015NewLineElseDi2015NewLine    noOfColumns = gvReport.Columns.CountDi2015NewLine    noOfRows = gvReport.Rows.CountDi2015NewLineEnd IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim HeaderTextSize As Single = 8Di2015NewLineDim ReportNameSize As Single = 10Di2015NewLineDim ReportTextSize As Single = 8Di2015NewLineDim ApplicationNameSize As Single = 7Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PDF documentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim document As Document = NothingDi2015NewLineIf LandScape = True ThenDi2015NewLine    ' Sets the document to A4 size and rotates it so that the     orientation of the page is Landscape.Di2015NewLine    document = New Document(PageSize.A4.Rotate(), 0, 0, 15, 5)Di2015NewLineElseDi2015NewLine    document = New Document(PageSize.A4, 0, 0, 15, 5)Di2015NewLineEnd IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PdfPTable with column count of the table equal to no of columns of the gridview or gridview datasource.Di2015NewLineDim mainTable As New iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfPTable(noOfColumns)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Sets the first 4 rows of the table as the header rows which will be repeated in all the pages.Di2015NewLinemainTable.HeaderRows = 4Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PdfPTable with 2 columns to hold the header in the exported PDF.Di2015NewLineDim headerTable As New iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfPTable(2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a phrase to hold the application name at the left hand side of the header.Di2015NewLineDim phApplicationName As New Phrase("Sample Application", FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ApplicationNameSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PdfPCell which accepts a phrase as a parameter.Di2015NewLineDim clApplicationName As New PdfPCell(phApplicationName)Di2015NewLine' Sets the border of the cell to zero.Di2015NewLineclApplicationName.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLine' Sets the Horizontal Alignment of the PdfPCell to left.Di2015NewLineclApplicationName.HorizontalAlignment = Element.ALIGN_LEFTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a phrase to show the current date at the right hand side of the header.Di2015NewLineDim phDate As New Phrase(DateTime.Now.[Date].ToString("dd/MM/yyyy"), FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ApplicationNameSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PdfPCell which accepts the date phrase as a parameter.Di2015NewLineDim clDate As New PdfPCell(phDate)Di2015NewLine' Sets the Horizontal Alignment of the PdfPCell to right.Di2015NewLineclDate.HorizontalAlignment = Element.ALIGN_RIGHTDi2015NewLine' Sets the border of the cell to zero.Di2015NewLineclDate.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Adds the cell which holds the application name to the headerTable.Di2015NewLineheaderTable.AddCell(clApplicationName)Di2015NewLine' Adds the cell which holds the date to the headerTable.Di2015NewLineheaderTable.AddCell(clDate)Di2015NewLine' Sets the border of the headerTable to zero.Di2015NewLineheaderTable.DefaultCell.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a PdfPCell that accepts the headerTable as a parameter and then adds that cell to the main PdfPTable.Di2015NewLineDim cellHeader As New PdfPCell(headerTable)Di2015NewLinecellHeader.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLine' Sets the column span of the header cell to noOfColumns.Di2015NewLinecellHeader.Colspan = noOfColumnsDi2015NewLine' Adds the above header cell to the table.Di2015NewLinemainTable.AddCell(cellHeader)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a phrase which holds the file name.Di2015NewLineDim phHeader As New Phrase("Sample Export", FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ReportNameSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.BOLD))Di2015NewLineDim clHeader As New PdfPCell(phHeader)Di2015NewLineclHeader.Colspan = noOfColumnsDi2015NewLineclHeader.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLineclHeader.HorizontalAlignment = Element.ALIGN_CENTERDi2015NewLinemainTable.AddCell(clHeader)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a phrase for a new line.Di2015NewLineDim phSpace As New Phrase(vbLf)Di2015NewLineDim clSpace As New PdfPCell(phSpace)Di2015NewLineclSpace.Border = PdfPCell.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLineclSpace.Colspan = noOfColumnsDi2015NewLinemainTable.AddCell(clSpace)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Sets the gridview column names as table headers.Di2015NewLineFor i As Integer = 0 To noOfColumns - 1Di2015NewLine    Dim ph As Phrase = NothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If gvReport.AutoGenerateColumns ThenDi2015NewLine        ph = New Phrase(tbl.Columns(i).ColumnName, FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", HeaderTextSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.BOLD))Di2015NewLine    ElseDi2015NewLine        ph = New Phrase(gvReport.Columns(i).HeaderText, FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", HeaderTextSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.BOLD))Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mainTable.AddCell(ph)Di2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Reads the gridview rows and adds them to the mainTableDi2015NewLineFor rowNo As Integer = 0 To noOfRows - 1Di2015NewLine    For columnNo As Integer = 0 To noOfColumns - 1Di2015NewLine        If gvReport.AutoGenerateColumns ThenDi2015NewLine            Dim s As String = gvReport.Rows(rowNo).Cells(columnNo).Text.Trim()Di2015NewLine            Dim ph As New Phrase(s, FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ReportTextSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL))Di2015NewLine            mainTable.AddCell(ph)Di2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            If TypeOf gvReport.Columns(columnNo) Is TemplateField ThenDi2015NewLine                Dim lc As DataBoundLiteralControl = TryCast(gvReport.Rows(rowNo).Cells(columnNo).Controls(0), DataBoundLiteralControl)Di2015NewLine                Dim s As String = lc.Text.Trim()Di2015NewLine                Dim ph As New Phrase(s, FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ReportTextSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL))Di2015NewLine                mainTable.AddCell(ph)Di2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                Dim s As String = gvReport.Rows(rowNo).Cells(columnNo).Text.Trim()Di2015NewLine                Dim ph As New Phrase(s, FontFactory.GetFont("Arial", ReportTextSize, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL))Di2015NewLine                mainTable.AddCell(ph)Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Tells the mainTable to complete the row even if any cell is left incomplete.Di2015NewLine    mainTable.CompleteRow()Di2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Gets the instance of the document created and writes it to the output stream of the Response object.Di2015NewLinePdfWriter.GetInstance(document, Response.OutputStream)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Creates a footer for the PDF document.Di2015NewLineDim pdfFooter As New HeaderFooter(New Phrase(), True)Di2015NewLinepdfFooter.Alignment = Element.ALIGN_CENTERDi2015NewLinepdfFooter.Border = iTextSharp.text.Rectangle.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Sets the document footer to pdfFooter.Di2015NewLinedocument.Footer = pdfFooterDi2015NewLine' Opens the document.Di2015NewLinedocument.Open()Di2015NewLine' Adds the mainTable to the document.Di2015NewLinedocument.Add(mainTable)Di2015NewLine' Closes the document.Di2015NewLinedocument.Close()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineResponse.ContentType = "application/pdf"Di2015NewLineResponse.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment; filename= 11159364Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class MultiKeyGestureDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private List<Keys> _keys;Di2015NewLine        public MultiKeyGesture(IEnumerable<Keys> keys, Keys modifiers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _keys = new List<Keys>(keys);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_keys.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("At least one key must be specified.", "keys");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int currentindex;Di2015NewLine        public bool Matches(KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_keys[currentindex] == e.KeyCode)Di2015NewLine                //at least a partial matchDi2015NewLine                currentindex++;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                //No MatchDi2015NewLine                currentindex = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (currentindex + 1 > _keys.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Matched last keyDi2015NewLine                currentindex = 0;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11160067Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ParameterReplacerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Produces an expression identical to 'expression'Di2015NewLine    // except with 'source' parameter replaced with 'target' expression.     Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<TOutput> Replace<TInput, TOutput>Di2015NewLine                    (Expression<TInput> expression,Di2015NewLine                    ParameterExpression source,Di2015NewLine                    Expression target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ParameterReplacerVisitor<TOutput>(source, target)Di2015NewLine                    .VisitAndConvert(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ParameterReplacerVisitor<TOutput> : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ParameterExpression _source;Di2015NewLine        private Expression _target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ParameterReplacerVisitorDi2015NewLine                (ParameterExpression source, Expression target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _source = source;Di2015NewLine            _target = target;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Expression<TOutput> VisitAndConvert<T>(Expression<T> root)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Expression<TOutput>)VisitLambda(root);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitLambda<T>(Expression<T> node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Leave all parameters alone except the one we want to replace.Di2015NewLine            var parameters = node.ParametersDi2015NewLine                                 .Where(p => p != _source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<TOutput>(Visit(node.Body), parameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Replace the source with the target, visit other params as usual.Di2015NewLine            return node == _source ? _target : base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11160835Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InvertedWrapPanel : WrapPanelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int itemsPerRow = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Size MeasureOverride(Size availableSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Orientation == Orientation.Horizontal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return base.MeasureOverride(availableSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else //Orientation is verticalDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double w = availableSize.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double maxChildWidth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (UIElement child in Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Get the current childs desired size parametersDi2015NewLine                child.Measure(availableSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Store off the maximum child widthDi2015NewLine                if (child.DesiredSize.Width > maxChildWidth)Di2015NewLine                    maxChildWidth = child.DesiredSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //See how many items we can fit in a rowDi2015NewLine            itemsPerRow = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor(w / maxChildWidth));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.MeasureOverride(availableSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Size ArrangeOverride(Size finalSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Orientation == Orientation.Horizontal)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return base.ArrangeOverride(finalSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else //Orientation is verticalDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double currentX = 0;Di2015NewLine            double currentY = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int col = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double lastX = 0;Di2015NewLine            double lastWidth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Arrays to store differing column heightsDi2015NewLine            double[] lastY = new double[itemsPerRow];Di2015NewLine            double[] lastHeight = new double[itemsPerRow];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[] colHeights = new double[itemsPerRow];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (UIElement child in Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //If we've reached the end of a rowDi2015NewLine                if (col >= itemsPerRow)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    col = 0;Di2015NewLine                    currentX = 0; //reset the x-coordinate for first columnDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    currentX = lastX + lastWidth; //Increase the x-coordinateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Increase the y-coordinates for the current columnDi2015NewLine                currentY = lastY[col] + lastHeight[col];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Draw the elementDi2015NewLine                child.Arrange(new Rect(currentX, currentY, child.DesiredSize.Width, child.DesiredSize.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Store off the current child's parametersDi2015NewLine                lastX = currentX;Di2015NewLine                lastWidth = child.DesiredSize.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lastY[col] = currentY;Di2015NewLine                lastHeight[col] = child.DesiredSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                colHeights[col] += child.DesiredSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                col++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set the height of the panel to the max column height.Di2015NewLine            //Otherwise scroll bar will set height to infinity.Di2015NewLine            double maxHeight = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (double d in colHeights)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (d > maxHeight)Di2015NewLine                    maxHeight = d;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            base.Height = maxHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return finalSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11162141Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool Build(string command, out StringBuilder buildOutput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buildOutput = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                ProcessStartInfo startInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("cmd.exe");Di2015NewLine                startInfo.Arguments = "/C " + " nasm " + command;Di2015NewLine                startInfo.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine                startInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine                startInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine                startInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine                Process p = Process.Start(startInfo);Di2015NewLine                string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine                if (output.Length != 0)Di2015NewLine                    buildOutput.Append(output);Di2015NewLine                else if (error.Length != 0)Di2015NewLine                    buildOutput.Append(error);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    buildOutput.Append("\\n");Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buildOutput = null;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11162953Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Expression<Func<TModel, dynamic>>> CreateME<TModel>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var stack = new Stack<StackItem>();Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(TModel);Di2015NewLine        var parameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(type, "x");Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(new StackItem(typeof(TModel), parameterExpression));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var currentItem = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var properties = currentItem.PropertyType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (IsComplexProperty(property))Di2015NewLine                    stack.Push(new StackItem(property.PropertyType, Expression.PropertyOrField(currentItem.AccessChainExpression, property.Name)));Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return GetSimplePropertyExpression<TModel>(parameterExpression, currentItem.AccessChainExpression, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Expression<Func<TModel, dynamic>> GetSimplePropertyExpression<TModel>(ParameterExpression lhs, Expression accessChain, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberAccess = Expression.Convert(Expression.PropertyOrField(accessChain, propertyName), typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TModel, dynamic>>(memberAccess, lhs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsComplexProperty(PropertyInfo p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !typeof (ICollection).IsAssignableFrom(p.PropertyType) && p.PropertyType.Namespace != "System";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class StackItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public StackItem(Type propertyType, Expression accessChainExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyType = propertyType;Di2015NewLine            AccessChainExpression = accessChainExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Type PropertyType { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Expression AccessChainExpression { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11164412Di2015UniqueSeparator// Cancellation token for the latest task.Di2015NewLineprivate CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void OnClick(object sender, ItemClickEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If a cancellation token already exists (for a previous task),Di2015NewLine    // cancel it.Di2015NewLine    if (this.cancellationTokenSource != null)Di2015NewLine        this.cancellationTokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new cancellation token for the new task.Di2015NewLine    this.cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken cancellationToken = this.cancellationTokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start the new task.Di2015NewLine    var task = Task.Factory.StartNew<object>(LongMethod, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the task continuation to execute on UI thread,Di2015NewLine    // but only if the associated cancellation tokenDi2015NewLine    // has not been cancelled.Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(TaskCallback, Di2015NewLine        cancellationToken, Di2015NewLine        TaskContinuationOptions.NotOnCanceled, Di2015NewLine        TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TaskCallback(Task<object> task)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Just update UIDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11164419Di2015UniqueSeparator<em>
11164419Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dbResults = GetMatches();Di2015NewLine            var firstLine = HtmlSubstring(dbResults[0], 0, 15);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(firstLine);Di2015NewLine            var secondLine = HtmlSubstring(dbResults[1], 0, 33);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(secondLine);Di2015NewLine            var thirdLine = HtmlSubstring(dbResults[2], 0, 10);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(thirdLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<string> GetMatches()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new List<string>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                "i have been <em>match</em>ed"Di2015NewLine                ,"a <em>match</em> will happen in the word <em>match</em>"Di2015NewLine                , "some random words including the word <em>match</em> here"Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string HtmlSubstring(string mainString, int start, int length = int.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder substringResult = new StringBuilder(mainString.Replace("</em>", "").Replace("<em>", "").Substring(start, length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get indexes between start and (start + length) that need highlighting.Di2015NewLine            int matchIndex = mainString.IndexOf("<em>", start);Di2015NewLine            while (matchIndex > 0 && matchIndex < (substringResult.Length - start))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int matchIndexConverted = matchIndex - start;Di2015NewLine                int matchEndIndex = mainString.IndexOf("</em>", matchIndex) - start;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                substringResult.Insert(matchIndexConverted, "<em>");Di2015NewLine                substringResult.Insert(Math.Min(substringResult.Length, matchEndIndex), "</em>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                matchIndex = mainString.IndexOf("<em>", matchIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return substringResult.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ConvertExpression(Expression<Func<string, DateTime, byte, long, bool>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var jobAuditParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(svc_JobAudit), "jobAudit");Di2015NewLine        var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<svc_JobAudit, bool>>(new ReplaceVisitor().Modify(expression.Body, jobAuditParameter), jobAuditParameter);Di2015NewLine parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Expression Modify(Expression expression, ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.parameter = parameter;Di2015NewLine "JobName");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (node.Type == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Property(parameter, "RanAt");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (node.Type == typeof(byte))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Property(parameter, "Result");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (node.Type == typeof(long))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Property(parameter, "Elapsed");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11165972Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection<Item> workList;Di2015NewLineCancellationTokenSource cts;Di2015NewLineint itemcountDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Run()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int num_workers = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //create worklist, filled with initial workDi2015NewLine  worklist = new BlockingCollection<Item>(Di2015NewLine    new ConcurrentQueue<Item>(GetInitialWork()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine  itemcount = worklist.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for( int i = 0; i < num_workers; i++)Di2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew( RunWorker );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumberable<Item> GetInitialWork() { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void RunWorker() {Di2015NewLine  try  {Di2015NewLine    do {Di2015NewLine      Item i = worklist.Take( cts.Token );Di2015NewLine      //blocks until item available or cancelledDi2015NewLine          Process(i);Di2015NewLine      //exit loop if no more items leftDi2015NewLine    } while (Interlocked.Decrement( ref itemcount) > 0);Di2015NewLine  } finally {Di2015NewLine      if( ! cts.IsCancellationRequested )Di2015NewLine        cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void AddWork( Item item) {Di2015NewLine  Interlocked.Increment( ref itemcount );Di2015NewLine  worklist.Add(item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Process( Item i ) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //Do what you want to the work item here.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
