11166286Di2015UniqueSeparator protected void ExportPDF(GridView gridViewReport)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int columnNumber = 0, rowNumber = 0;Di2015NewLine        DataTable tbl = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (gridViewReport.AutoGenerateColumns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tbl = gridViewReport.DataSource as DataTable; // Gets the DataSource of the GridView Control.Di2015NewLine            columnNumber = tbl.Columns.Count;Di2015NewLine            rowNumber = tbl.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            columnNumber = gridViewReport.Columns.Count;Di2015NewLine            rowNumber = gridViewReport.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Creates a PDF documentDi2015NewLine        Document document = null;Di2015NewLine        document = new Document(PageSize.A4, 0, 0, 15, 5);Di2015NewLine        PdfPTable _table = new PdfPTable(GridView1.Columns.Count);Di2015NewLine        _table.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_RTL;Di2015NewLine        BaseFont baseFont = BaseFont.CreateFont("c:\\\\\\\\windows\\\\\\\\fonts\\\\\\\\tahoma.ttf", BaseFont.IDENTITY_H, true); // Font which has Arabic charactersDi2015NewLine        iTextSharp.text.Font font = new iTextSharp.text.Font(baseFont, 10, iTextSharp.text.Font.NORMAL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sets the gridview column names as table headers.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < columnNumber; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfPCell ph = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (gridViewReport.AutoGenerateColumns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, tbl.Columns[i].ColumnName, font));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, gridViewReport.Columns[i].HeaderText, font));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (ph != null && gridViewReport.Columns[i].HeaderText != "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Regex.IsMatch(gridViewReport.Columns[i].HeaderText, "^[a-zA-Z0-9 ]*$")) // Check if Header Text is EnglishDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ph.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_LTR; // Left to RightDi2015NewLine                    BaseColor color = new BaseColor(Color.Red);Di2015NewLine                    ph.BackgroundColor = color;Di2015NewLine                    _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ph.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_RTL; //Right to LeftDi2015NewLine                    BaseColor color = new BaseColor(Color.Red);Di2015NewLine                    ph.BackgroundColor = color;Di2015NewLine                    _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ph.Border = iTextSharp.text.Rectangle.NO_BORDER;Di2015NewLine                _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Get the gridview rows and adds them to the _tableDi2015NewLine        for (int rowIteration = 0; rowIteration < rowNumber; rowIteration++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int columnIteration = 0; columnIteration < columnNumber; columnIteration++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (gridViewReport.AutoGenerateColumns) //Check if AutoGenrated ColunmsDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string s = gridViewReport.Rows[rowIteration].Cells[columnIteration].Text.Trim();Di2015NewLine                    PdfPCell ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, s, font));Di2015NewLine                    _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (gridViewReport.Columns[columnIteration] is TemplateField) // Check if Item TemplateDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        PdfPCell ph = null;Di2015NewLine                        Label lc = gridViewReport.Rows[rowIteration].Cells[columnIteration].Controls[1] as Label; // LabelDi2015NewLine                        Button btn = gridViewReport.Rows[rowIteration].Cells[columnIteration].Controls[1] as Button;// ButtonDi2015NewLine                        HyperLink hyperLink = gridViewReport.Rows[rowIteration].Cells[columnIteration].Controls[1] as HyperLink; // HyperLinkDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (lc != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            string s = lc.Text.Trim();Di2015NewLine                            ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, s, font));Di2015NewLine                            if (Regex.IsMatch(s, "^[a-zA-Z0-9 ]*$")) //Check if cell string is EnglishDi2015NewLine                            {   ph.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_LTR; // Left to RightDi2015NewLine                                _table.AddCell(ph); Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                ph.RunDirection = PdfWriter.RUN_DIRECTION_RTL; // Right to LeftDi2015NewLine                                _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if (btn != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, btn.Text, font));Di2015NewLine                            ph.Phrase.Clear(); // Clear the Cell PhraseDi2015NewLine                            ph.Border = iTextSharp.text.Rectangle.NO_BORDER;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if (hyperLink != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, hyperLink.Text, font));Di2015NewLine                            ph.Phrase.Clear(); //Clear the Cell PhraseDi2015NewLine                            ph.Border = iTextSharp.text.Rectangle.NO_BORDER; Di2015NewLine                            _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            _table.AddCell("--");Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string s = gridViewReport.Rows[rowIteration].Cells[columnIteration].Text.Trim();Di2015NewLine                        PdfPCell ph = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(10, s, font));Di2015NewLine                        _table.AddCell(ph);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _table.CompleteRow();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, Response.OutputStream);Di2015NewLine        // Opens the document.Di2015NewLine        document.Open();Di2015NewLine        // Adds the _table to the document.Di2015NewLine        document.Add(_table);Di2015NewLine        // Closes the document.Di2015NewLine        document.Close();Di2015NewLine        Page.Response.ContentType = "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine        Page.Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=MyGrid.pdf");Di2015NewLine        Page.Response.Cache.SetCacheability(HttpCacheability.NoCache);Di2015NewLine        Page.Response.Write(document);Di2015NewLine        Page.Response.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11167967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MainProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<char[]> lst = new List<char[]>();Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Register for a notification. Di2015NewLine            GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification(10, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start a thread using WaitForFullGCProc.Di2015NewLine            Thread startpolling = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Check for a notification of an approaching collection.Di2015NewLine                    GCNotificationStatus s = GC.WaitForFullGCApproach(1000);Di2015NewLine                    if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Call eventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("GC is about to begin");Di2015NewLine                        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Canceled)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Cancelled the RegistrationDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Timeout)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Timeout occurred.Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Check for a notification of a completed collection.Di2015NewLine                    s = GC.WaitForFullGCComplete(1000);Di2015NewLine                    if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Call eventDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("GC has ended");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Canceled)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Cancelled the registrationDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (s == GCNotificationStatus.Timeout)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Timeout occurredDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            startpolling.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Allocate huge memory to apply pressure on GCDi2015NewLine            AllocateMemory();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Unregister the processDi2015NewLine            GC.CancelFullGCNotification();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AllocateMemory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            char[] bbb = new char[1000]; // creates a block of 1000 charactersDi2015NewLine            lst.Add(bbb);                // Adding to list ensures that the object doesnt gets out of scope   Di2015NewLine            int counter = GC.CollectionCount(2);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("GC Collected {0} objects", counter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11168970Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ChartControlDragOver(object sender, DragEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLinevar chartControl = (ChartControl)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the control we are hovering over.Di2015NewLinevar hitInformation = chartControl.CalcHitInfo(chartControl.PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y)));Di2015NewLineif ((hitInformation != null)) {Di2015NewLine    //ChartHitInfo hoverTab = hitInformation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.Data.GetDataPresent(typeof(ChartControl))) {Di2015NewLine        e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Move;Di2015NewLine        var dragTab = (ChartControl)e.Data.GetData(typeof(ChartControl));Di2015NewLine        if (dragTab == chartControl) return;Di2015NewLine        InsertType insertType = InsertType.Left;Di2015NewLine        Point hitPoint = chartControl.Parent.PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y));Di2015NewLine        if (dragTab.Bounds.Left < hitPoint.X && dragTab.Bounds.Right > hitPoint.X) {Di2015NewLine            if (dragTab.Bounds.Top > hitPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine                insertType = InsertType.Top;Di2015NewLine            else if (dragTab.Bounds.Bottom < hitPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine                insertType = InsertType.Bottom;Di2015NewLine        } else if (dragTab.Bounds.Right < hitPoint.X)Di2015NewLine            insertType = InsertType.Right;Di2015NewLine        else if (dragTab.Bounds.Left > hitPoint.X)Di2015NewLine            insertType = InsertType.Left;Di2015NewLine        LayoutControl layout = (LayoutControl)chartControl.Parent;Di2015NewLine        layout.GetItemByControl(dragTab).Move(layout.GetItemByControl(chartControl), insertType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} else {Di2015NewLine    e.Effect = DragDropEffects.None;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11172258Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum
11172258Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public Enum Cycle(this Enum e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool found = false;Di2015NewLine    Enum first = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (Enum i in Enum.GetValues(e.GetType()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null)Di2015NewLine            first = i;Di2015NewLine        if (found)Di2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        found = e.Equals(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (found)Di2015NewLine        return first;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11172258Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnum.GetValues
11172258Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public Enum Cycle(this Enum e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var i = ((IConvertible)e).ToInt64(null) + 1;Di2015NewLine    var eT = e.GetType();Di2015NewLine    var next = Enum.GetName(eT, i);Di2015NewLine    return (Enum)Enum.Parse(eT, next ?? Enum.GetName(eT, 0), false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11172595Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerablesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> TopN<T, TV>(this IEnumerable<T> value, Func<T, TV> selector, Int32 count, IComparer<TV> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var qCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        var queue = new SortedList<TV, List<T>>(count, comparer);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var val in value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var currTv = selector(val);Di2015NewLine            if (qCount >= count && comparer.Compare(currTv, queue.Keys[0]) <= 0) continue;Di2015NewLine            if (qCount == count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var list = queue.Values[0];Di2015NewLine                if (list.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine                    queue.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    list.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine                qCount--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (queue.ContainsKey(currTv))Di2015NewLine                queue[currTv].Add(val);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                queue.Add(currTv, new List<T> {val});Di2015NewLine            qCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return queue.SelectMany(kvp => kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> TopN<T, TV>(this IEnumerable<T> value, Func<T, TV> selector, Int32 count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.TopN(selector, count, Comparer<TV>.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> BottomN<T, TV>(this IEnumerable<T> value, Func<T, TV> selector, Int32 count, IComparer<TV> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.TopN(selector, count, new ReverseComparer<TV>(comparer));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> BottomN<T, TV>(this IEnumerable<T> value, Func<T, TV> selector, Int32 count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.BottomN(selector, count, Comparer<TV>.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Helper classDi2015NewLinepublic class ReverseComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IComparer<T> _comparer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return -1*_comparer.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReverseComparer()Di2015NewLine        : this(Comparer<T>.Default)Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReverseComparer(IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comparer == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("comparer");Di2015NewLine        _comparer = comparer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11176260Di2015UniqueSeparator// store Excel sheet (or any file for that matter) into a SQL Server tableDi2015NewLinepublic void StoreExcelToDatabase(string excelFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if file doesn't exist --> terminate (you might want to show a message box or something)Di2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(excelFileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get all the bytes of the file into memoryDi2015NewLine    byte[] excelContents = File.ReadAllBytes(excelFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // define SQL statement to useDi2015NewLine    string insertStmt = "INSERT INTO dbo.YourTable(FileName, BinaryContent) VALUES(@FileName, @BinaryContent)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set up connection and command to do INSERTDi2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection("your-connection-string-here"))Di2015NewLine    using (SqlCommand cmdInsert = new SqlCommand(insertStmt, connection))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         cmdInsert.Parameters.Add("@FileName", SqlDbType.VarChar, 500).Value = excelFileName;Di2015NewLine         cmdInsert.Parameters.Add("@BinaryContent", SqlDbType.VarBinary, int.MaxValue).Value = excelContents;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // open connection, execute SQL statement, close connection againDi2015NewLine         connection.Open();Di2015NewLine         cmdInsert.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine         connection.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11176260Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RetrieveExcelFromDatabase(int ID, string excelFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] excelContents;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string selectStmt = "SELECT BinaryContent FROM dbo.YourTableHere WHERE ID = @ID";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection("your-connection-string-here"))Di2015NewLine    using (SqlCommand cmdSelect = new SqlCommand(selectStmt, connection))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cmdSelect.Parameters.Add("@ID", SqlDbType.Int).Value = ID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLine        excelContents = (byte[])cmdSelect.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine        connection.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    File.WriteAllBytes(excelFileName, excelContents);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

11177017Di2015UniqueSeparatorWebResponse response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine// Check the status. 11178623Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @folderToDelete int = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine;WITH RESULT (folders,LEVEL)Di2015NewLine  ASDi2015NewLine  (Di2015NewLine  --anchorDi2015NewLine   SELECTDi2015NewLine      folderId [folders]Di2015NewLine      ,0 AS LEVELDi2015NewLine   FROM folder AS E Di2015NewLine   WHERE folderId = @folderToDeleteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  UNION ALLDi2015NewLine  SELECT Di2015NewLine      E.folderId [folders]Di2015NewLine      ,LEVEL +1 --switched parent/childDi2015NewLine  FROM Di2015NewLine      folder AS EDi2015NewLine      INNER JOIN RESULT AS D  Di2015NewLine         ON Di2015NewLine          E.parentFolder=D.folders Di2015NewLine  --WHERE LEVEL < 100Di2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLineSELECT *Di2015NewLineFROM RESULT OPTION (MAXRECURSION 100)Di2015NewLine

11179532Di2015UniqueSeparatorDate

11179532Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Represents a date between January 1, 0001 CE, and December 31, 9999 CE, in the proleptic Gregorian calendar.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic struct DateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const Int32 DaysPerYear = 365;Di2015NewLine    public const Int32 MonthsPerYear = 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 MaxSerialNumber = 3652058;Di2015NewLine    private const UInt32 December = 11; // 0-basedDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 DaysInDecember = 31;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 LeapYearInterval1 = 4;Di2015NewLine    private const UInt32 LeapYearInterval2 = 100;Di2015NewLine    private const UInt32 LeapYearInterval3 = 400;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 DaysPerLeapYearInterval1 =Di2015NewLine        DaysPerYear * LeapYearInterval1 + 1; // +1 leap day every 4 yearsDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 DaysPerLeapYearInterval2 =Di2015NewLine        DaysPerLeapYearInterval1 * (LeapYearInterval2 / LeapYearInterval1) - 1; // -1 leap day every 100 yearsDi2015NewLine    private const UInt32 DaysPerLeapYearInterval3 =Di2015NewLine        DaysPerLeapYearInterval2 * (LeapYearInterval3 / LeapYearInterval2) + 1; // +1 leap day every 400 yearsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly UInt32[] DaysOfYear =Di2015NewLine        new UInt32[(MonthsPerYear + 1) * 2]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            0, 31, 59, 90, 120, 151, 181, 212, 243, 273, 304, 334, 365,Di2015NewLine            0, 31, 60, 91, 121, 152, 182, 213, 244, 274, 305, 335, 366,Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly UInt16 _zeroBasedYear; // 0 to 9998Di2015NewLine    private readonly Byte _zeroBasedMonth; // 0 to 11Di2015NewLine    private readonly Byte _zeroBasedDay; // 0 to 30Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="Date" /> structure to a specified serial number.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="serialNumber">Di2015NewLine    /// The <see cref="SerialNumber" /> of the new <see cref="Date" />.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ArgumentOutOfRangeException">Di2015NewLine    /// <paramref name="serialNumber" /> is less than 0 or greater than 3652058.Di2015NewLine    /// </exception>Di2015NewLine    public Date(Int32 serialNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Require.IsBetween("serialNumber", serialNumber, 0, (Int32)MaxSerialNumber);Di2015NewLine        UInt32 days = (UInt32)serialNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the first year of the 400-year period that contains the date:Di2015NewLine        UInt32 zeroBasedYear = days / DaysPerLeapYearInterval3 * LeapYearInterval3;Di2015NewLine        days %= DaysPerLeapYearInterval3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Within the 400-year period, advance to the first year of the century that contains the date:Di2015NewLine        UInt32 centuries = days / DaysPerLeapYearInterval2;Di2015NewLine        zeroBasedYear += centuries * LeapYearInterval2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Special case: If the date is the last day (December 31) of the 400-year period,Di2015NewLine        // then "centuries" will be out of range because the fourth century has one more day than the others:Di2015NewLine        if (centuries == LeapYearInterval3 / LeapYearInterval2)Di2015NewLine            goto December31;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        days %= DaysPerLeapYearInterval2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Within the century, advance to the first year of the 4-year period that contains the date:Di2015NewLine        zeroBasedYear += days / DaysPerLeapYearInterval1 * LeapYearInterval1;Di2015NewLine        days %= DaysPerLeapYearInterval1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Within the 4-year period, advance to the year that contains the date:Di2015NewLine        UInt32 years = days / DaysPerYear;Di2015NewLine        zeroBasedYear += years;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Special case: If the date is the last day (December 31) of the 4-year period,Di2015NewLine        // then "years" will be out of range because the fourth year has one more day than the others:Di2015NewLine        if (years == LeapYearInterval1)Di2015NewLine            goto December31;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        days %= DaysPerYear;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Estimate the month using an efficient divisor:Di2015NewLine        Int32 index = GetDaysOfYearIndex(zeroBasedYear);Di2015NewLine        UInt32 zeroBasedMonth = days / 32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the estimate was too low, adjust it:Di2015NewLine        if (days >= DaysOfYear[index + (Int32)zeroBasedMonth + 1])Di2015NewLine            ++zeroBasedMonth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _zeroBasedYear = (UInt16)zeroBasedYear;Di2015NewLine        _zeroBasedMonth = (Byte)zeroBasedMonth;Di2015NewLine        _zeroBasedDay = (Byte)(days - DaysOfYear[index + (Int32)zeroBasedMonth]);Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    December31:Di2015NewLine        _zeroBasedYear = (UInt16)(zeroBasedYear - 1);Di2015NewLine        _zeroBasedMonth = (Byte)December;Di2015NewLine        _zeroBasedDay = (Byte)(DaysInDecember - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Int32 GetDaysOfYearIndex(UInt32 zeroBasedYear)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !InternalIsLeapYear(zeroBasedYear) ? 0 : MonthsPerYear + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Boolean InternalIsLeapYear(UInt32 zeroBasedYear)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UInt32 year = zeroBasedYear + 1;Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            (year % LeapYearInterval1 == 0) &&Di2015NewLine            (year % LeapYearInterval2 != 0 || year % LeapYearInterval3 == 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11180788Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class Curve Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public float EaseIn(double s);Di2015NewLine    public float EaseOut(double s);Di2015NewLine    public static float EaseInOut(double s);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class StepCurve : CurveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override float EaseIn(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s < 0.5 ? 0.0f : 1.0f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s < 0.5 ? 0.0f : 1.0f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseInOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s < 0.5 ? 0.0f : 1.0f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LinearCurve : CurveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override float EaseIn(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseInOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SineCurve : CurveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override float EaseIn(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)Math.Sin(s * MathHelper.HalfPi - MathHelper.HalfPi) + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)Math.Sin(s * MathHelper.HalfPi);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseInOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)(Math.Sin(s * MathHelper.Pi - MathHelper.HalfPi) + 1) / 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PowerCurve : CurveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int _power;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PowerCurve(int power)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _power = power;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseIn(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (float)Math.Pow(s, _power);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sign = _power % 2 == 0 ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine        return (float)(sign * (Math.Pow(s - 1, _power) + sign));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override float EaseInOut(double s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s *= 2;Di2015NewLine        if (s < 1) return EaseIn(s, _power) / 2;Di2015NewLine        var sign = _power % 2 == 0 ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine        return (float)(sign / 2.0 * (Math.Pow(s - 2, _power) + sign * 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11180788Di2015UniqueSeparatorEase
11180788Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float Ease(double linearStep, float acceleration, Curve curve)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float easedStep = acceleration > 0 ? curve.EaseIn(linearStep) :Di2015NewLine                      acceleration < 0 ? curve.EaseOut(linearStep) :Di2015NewLine                      (float)linearStep;Di2015NewLine    return MathHelper.Lerp(linearStep, easedStep, Math.Abs(acceleration));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11183070Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void FizzBuzz()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Func<int, bool>, Func<int, string>> rules = new Dictionary<Func<int, bool>, Func<int, string>>();Di2015NewLine    rules.Add(x => x % 5 == 0 && x % 3 == 0, x => “fizzbuzz?);Di2015NewLine    rules.Add(x => x % 3 == 0, x => "fizz");Di2015NewLine    rules.Add(x => x % 5 == 0, x => "buzz");Di2015NewLine    rules.Add(x => x % 5 != 0 && x % 3 != 0, x => x.ToString());Di2015NewLine    rules.Add(x => true, x => "\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var output = from n in Enumerable.Range(1, 100)Di2015NewLine                 from f in rulesDi2015NewLine                 where f.Key(n)Di2015NewLine                 select f.Value(n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    output.ToList().ForEach(x => Console.Write(x));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11187271Di2015UniqueSeparator# Three points are a counter-clockwise turn if ccw > 0, clockwise ifDi2015NewLine# ccw < 0, and collinear if ccw = 0 because ccw is a determinant thatDi2015NewLine# gives the signed area of the triangle formed by p1, p2 and p3.Di2015NewLinefunction ccw(p1, p2, p3):Di2015NewLine    return (p2.x - p1.x)*(p3.y - p1.y) - (p2.y - p1.y)*(p3.x - p1.x)Di2015NewLine

11192529Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (DataRow newRow1 in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string zipCode1 = newRow1[2].ToString();Di2015NewLine            double latitude2 = Convert.ToDouble(newRow1[3]);Di2015NewLine            double longitude2 = Convert.ToDouble(newRow1[4]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start minD at the max valueDi2015NewLine            double minD = double.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow newRow2 in dt2.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (newRow2[2].ToString().Equals(zipCode1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newRow1[5] = newRow2[1].ToString();Di2015NewLine                    double latitude = Convert.ToDouble(newRow1[3]);Di2015NewLine                    double longitude = Convert.ToDouble(newRow1[4]);Di2015NewLine                    double d = Math.Sqrt(Math.Abs(latitude - latitude2) * Math.Abs(latitude - latitude2) + Math.Abs(longitude - longitude2) * Math.Abs(longitude - longitude2));Di2015NewLine                    minD = Math.Min(minD, d);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Found match!");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Min D: {0}", minD);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11198019Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate System.Data.DataTable ExecuteSql(DateTime BusinessDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Data.DataTable ReturnValue = new System.Data.DataTable;Di2015NewLine    string sql = "Select * From myTable WHERE TimestampColumn >= @StartDate AND TimestampColumn < @EndDate";Di2015NewLine    System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand cmd = new System.Data.OleDb.OleDb.Command(connectionString, sql);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For start date, we can't assume the user has passed in a date with a Di2015NewLine    // midnight time, so first, use DateTime.Date to get JUST the date at midnight, Di2015NewLine    // then add 7 hours to get to the desired start time.Di2015NewLine    // For example, if the calling code had passed in 1/1/2001 8:00 AM we would useDi2015NewLine    // the .Date property to get it to 1/1/2001 12:00 AMDi2015NewLine    // and then add 7 hours.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cmd.Parameters.Add(@StartDate, BusinessDate.Date.AddHours(7));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The end date - same logic, but instead of adding 7 hours, add 31 Di2015NewLine    // (24 hours + 7 hours = 31 hours)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cmd.Parameters.Add(@EndDate, BusinessDate.Date.AddHours(31));  // 24 + 7Di2015NewLine    System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter ad = new System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter(cmd);Di2015NewLine    ad.Fill(ReturnValue)    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ReturnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11198110Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Bid.PoolerTrace("<sc.SqlInteralTransaction.Dispose|RES|CPOOL> %d#, Disposing\\n", this.ObjectID);Di2015NewLine  if (!disposing || this._innerConnection == null)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  this._disposing = true;Di2015NewLine  this.Rollback();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11198162Di2015UniqueSeparatorWHERE Title IN ([Title1], [Title2],...[TitleN]) Di2015NewLine
11198162Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string _camlTitleEq = "<Eq>" +Di2015NewLine                                 "<FieldRef Name=\\"Title\\" />" +Di2015NewLine                                 "<Value Type=\\"Text\\">{0}</Value>" +Di2015NewLine                              "</Eq>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate XElement BuildOrClause(List<string> listItemTitles, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //If we've reached the last item in the list, return only an Eq clauseDi2015NewLine    if (index == listItemTitles.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine        return XElement.Parse(String.Format(_camlTitleEq, listItemTitles[index]));Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //If there are more items in the list, create a new nested Or, whereDi2015NewLine        //the first value is an Eq clause and the second is the result of BuildOrClauseDi2015NewLine        XElement orClause = new XElement("Or");Di2015NewLine        orClause.Add(XElement.Parse(String.Format(_camlTitleEq, listItemTitles[index])));Di2015NewLine        orClause.Add(BuildOrClause(listItemTitles, index + 1));Di2015NewLine        return orClause;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11198162Di2015UniqueSeparatorSPQuery query = new SPQuery();Di2015NewLinestring titleIn = BuildOrClause(listItemTitles, 0).ToString(SaveOptions.DisableFormatting);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinequery.Query = "<Where>" +Di2015NewLine                  titleIn +Di2015NewLine              "</Where>";Di2015NewLine
11198165Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ListPCIDevices(false, listBox1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ListPCIDevices(bool ListOnlyNetworkDevices, ListBox LB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string NetKey = @"SYSTEM\\ControlSet001\\Enum\\PCI";Di2015NewLine        using (RegistryKey rk = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(NetKey))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string skName in rk.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (RegistryKey sk = rk.OpenSubKey(skName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (string skSubName in sk.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        using (RegistryKey ssk = sk.OpenSubKey(skSubName))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            object ItemName = ssk.GetValue("DeviceDesc");Di2015NewLine                            object ItemCat = ssk.GetValue("Class");Di2015NewLine                            if (ItemCat == null) { ItemCat = "Unknown"; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if ((ItemName != null) && ((ItemCat.ToString() == "Net")||(!ListOnlyNetworkDevices)))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                LB.Items.Add(ItemName.ToString().Split(';')[1]);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class MagicTypeConverter : ExpandableObjectConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(Di2015NewLine             ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value,Di2015NewLine             Attribute[] attributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var original = base.GetProperties(context, value, attributes);Di2015NewLine            var list = new List<PropertyDescriptor>(original.Count);Di2015NewLine            var magic = (Magic)value;Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in original)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool showProp = true;Di2015NewLine                switch (prop.Name)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "X": showProp = magic.ShowX; break;Di2015NewLine                    case "Y": showProp = magic.ShowY; break;Di2015NewLine                    case "Z": showProp = magic.ShowZ; break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (showProp) list.Add(prop);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return new PropertyDescriptorCollection(list.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11208543Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static bool NextPermutation(int[] numList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         KnuthsDi2015NewLine         1. Find the largest index j such that a[j] < a[j + 1]. If no such index exists, the permutation is the last permutation.Di2015NewLine         2. Find the largest index l such that a[j] < a[l]. Since j + 1 is such an index, l is well defined and satisfies j < l.Di2015NewLine         3. Swap a[j] with a[l].Di2015NewLine         4. Reverse the sequence from a[j + 1] up to and including the final element a[n].Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        var largestIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = numList.Length - 2; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (numList[i] < numList[i + 1]) {Di2015NewLine                largestIndex = i;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (largestIndex < 0) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var largestIndex2 = -1;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = numList.Length - 1 ; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine            if (numList[largestIndex] < numList[i]) {Di2015NewLine                largestIndex2 = i;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmp = numList[largestIndex];Di2015NewLine        numList[largestIndex] = numList[largestIndex2];Di2015NewLine        numList[largestIndex2] = tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = largestIndex + 1, j = numList.Length - 1; i < j; i++, j--) {Di2015NewLine            tmp = numList[i];Di2015NewLine            numList[i] = numList[j];Di2015NewLine            numList[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11208759Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WriteStreamToFile(MemoryStream stream, string baseFileName, string extension, out string realFileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        realFileName = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFile appStorage = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                baseFileName = GlobalSettings.NormalizeFileName(baseFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                realFileName = String.Concat(baseFileName, extension);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fileStream = appStorage.OpenFile(realFileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine                    stream.WriteTo(fileStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ReadStreamFromFile(MemoryStream stream, string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFile appStorage = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fileStream = appStorage.OpenFile(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine                fileStream.CopyTo(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
11208759Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object DeserializeObject(string fileName, Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFile appStorage = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fileStream = appStorage.OpenFile(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine        using (TextReader xmlReader = new StreamReader(fileStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(objectType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return xmlSerializer.Deserialize(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SerializeObject(string fileName, object target, Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFile appStorage = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fileStream = appStorage.OpenFile(fileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine        using (TextWriter xmlWriter = new StreamWriter(fileStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(objectType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xmlSerializer.Serialize(xmlWriter, target);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11210544Di2015UniqueSeparatorint samplesCount = samples.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int j = numLowestSamples; j < samplesCount; j++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double sample = samples[j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sample > 0 && sample < currentMax)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int k;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (k = 0; k < numLowestSamples; k++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (sample < lowestSamples[k])Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              Array.Copy(lowestSamples, k, lowestSamples, k + 1, numLowestSamples - k - 1);Di2015NewLine              lowestSamples[k] = sample;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              break;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (k == numLowestSamples)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           lowestSamples[numLowestSamples - 1] = sample;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentMax = lowestSamples[numLowestSamples - 1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11211813Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine//Helper method to make the Select cleaner:Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetProperty(IEnumerable<DataRow> rows, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return rowsDi2015NewLine        .Where(row => row.Field<string>("Property") == propertyName)Di2015NewLine        .Select(c => c.Field<string>("Value"))Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//helper method for populating the datatableDi2015NewLineprivate static void addRow(DataTable dt, string objectName, string columnNameDi2015NewLine    , string property, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var row = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine    row["ObjectName"] = objectName;Di2015NewLine    row["ColumnName"] = columnName;Di2015NewLine    row["Property"] = property;Di2015NewLine    row["Value"] = value;Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("ObjectName");Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("ColumnName");Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("Property");Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("Value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "bar", "a", "w");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "bar", "b", "x");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "bar", "c", "y");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "bar", "d", "z");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "test", "a", "i");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "test", "b", "j");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "test", "c", "k");Di2015NewLine    addRow(dt, "foo", "test", "d", "l");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var query = dt.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine        .GroupBy(row => newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ObjectName = row.Field<string>("ObjectName"),Di2015NewLine            ColumnName = row.Field<string>("ColumnName")Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .Select(g => newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ObjectName = g.Key.ObjectName,Di2015NewLine            ColumnName = g.Key.ColumnName,Di2015NewLine            a = GetProperty(g, "a"),Di2015NewLine            b = GetProperty(g, "b"),Di2015NewLine            c = GetProperty(g, "c"),Di2015NewLine            d = GetProperty(g, "d"),Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .CopyToDataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in query.Rows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn column in query.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Console.Write(row[column] + "\\t");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit. . .");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11211813Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Code copied directly from http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb669096.aspxDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic class ObjectShredder<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] _fi;Di2015NewLine    private System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[] _pi;Di2015NewLine    private System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, int> _ordinalMap;Di2015NewLine    private System.Type _type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ObjectShredder constructor.Di2015NewLine    public ObjectShredder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        _fi = _type.GetFields();Di2015NewLine        _pi = _type.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        _ordinalMap = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Loads a DataTable from a sequence of objects.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The sequence of objects to load into the DataTable.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="table">The input table. The schema of the table must match that Di2015NewLine    /// the type T.  If the table is null, a new table is created with a schema Di2015NewLine    /// created from the public properties and fields of the type T.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="options">Specifies how values from the source sequence will be applied to Di2015NewLine    /// existing rows in the table.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A DataTable created from the source sequence.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public DataTable Shred(IEnumerable<T> source, DataTable table, LoadOption? options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Load the table from the scalar sequence if T is a primitive type.Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T).IsPrimitive)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ShredPrimitive(source, table, options);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new table if the input table is null.Di2015NewLine        if (table == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            table = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize the ordinal map and extend the table schema based on type T.Di2015NewLine        table = ExtendTable(table, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerate the source sequence and load the object values into rows.Di2015NewLine        table.BeginLoadData();Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<T> e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (options != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    table.LoadDataRow(ShredObject(table, e.Current), (LoadOption)options);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    table.LoadDataRow(ShredObject(table, e.Current), true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the table.Di2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable ShredPrimitive(IEnumerable<T> source, DataTable table, LoadOption? options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a new table if the input table is null.Di2015NewLine        if (table == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            table = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!table.Columns.Contains("Value"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add("Value", typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerate the source sequence and load the scalar values into rows.Di2015NewLine        table.BeginLoadData();Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<T> e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Object[] values = new object[table.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine            while (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                values[table.Columns["Value"].Ordinal] = e.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (options != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    table.LoadDataRow(values, (LoadOption)options);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    table.LoadDataRow(values, true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the table.Di2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ShredObject(DataTable table, T instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo[] fi = _fi;Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] pi = _pi;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (instance.GetType() != typeof(T))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If the instance is derived from T, extend the table schemaDi2015NewLine            // and get the properties and fields.Di2015NewLine            ExtendTable(table, instance.GetType());Di2015NewLine            fi = instance.GetType().GetFields();Di2015NewLine            pi = instance.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the property and field values of the instance to an array.Di2015NewLine        Object[] values = new object[table.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo f in fi)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[_ordinalMap[f.Name]] = f.GetValue(instance);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo p in pi)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[_ordinalMap[p.Name]] = p.GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the property and field values of the instance.Di2015NewLine        return values;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable ExtendTable(DataTable table, Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Extend the table schema if the input table was null or if the value Di2015NewLine        // in the sequence is derived from type T.            Di2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo f in type.GetFields())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_ordinalMap.ContainsKey(f.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add the field as a column in the table if it doesn't existDi2015NewLine                // already.Di2015NewLine                DataColumn dc = table.Columns.Contains(f.Name) ? table.Columns[f.Name]Di2015NewLine                    : table.Columns.Add(f.Name, f.FieldType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Add the field to the ordinal map.Di2015NewLine                _ordinalMap.Add(f.Name, dc.Ordinal);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo p in type.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_ordinalMap.ContainsKey(p.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add the property as a column in the table if it doesn't existDi2015NewLine                // already.Di2015NewLine                DataColumn dc = table.Columns.Contains(p.Name) ? table.Columns[p.Name]Di2015NewLine                    : table.Columns.Add(p.Name, p.PropertyType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Add the property to the ordinal map.Di2015NewLine                _ordinalMap.Add(p.Name, dc.Ordinal);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the table.Di2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Code copied directly from http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb669096.aspxDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class CustomLINQtoDataSetMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DataTable CopyToDataTable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ObjectShredder<T>().Shred(source, null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DataTable CopyToDataTable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine                                                DataTable table, LoadOption? options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ObjectShredder<T>().Shred(source, table, options);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11212007Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int MAX_PATH = 260;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void checkPath(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (path.Length >= MAX_PATH)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        checkFile_LongPath(path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (!File.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("   *  File: " + path + " does not exist.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11212007Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void checkFile_LongPath(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] subpaths = path.Split('\\\\');Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sbNewPath = new StringBuilder(subpaths[0]);Di2015NewLine    // Build longest subpath that is less than MAX_PATH charactersDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < subpaths.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sbNewPath.Length + subpaths[i].Length >= MAX_PATH)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            subpaths = subpaths.Skip(i).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sbNewPath.Append("\\\\" + subpaths[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(sbNewPath.ToString());Di2015NewLine    bool foundMatch = dir.Exists;Di2015NewLine    if (foundMatch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure that all of the subdirectories in our path exist.Di2015NewLine        // Skip the last entry in subpaths, since it is our filename.Di2015NewLine        // If we try to specify the path in dir.GetDirectories(), Di2015NewLine        // We get a max path length error.Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while(i < subpaths.Length - 1 && foundMatch)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foundMatch = false;Di2015NewLine            foreach (DirectoryInfo subDir in dir.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (subDir.Name == subpaths[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Move on to the next subDirectoryDi2015NewLine                    dir = subDir;Di2015NewLine                    foundMatch = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (foundMatch)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foundMatch = false;Di2015NewLine            // Now that we've gone through all of the subpaths, see if our file exists.Di2015NewLine            // Once again, If we try to specify the path in dir.GetFiles(), Di2015NewLine            // we get a max path length error.Di2015NewLine            foreach (FileInfo fi in dir.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (fi.Name == subpaths[subpaths.Length - 1])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foundMatch = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If we didn't find a match, write to the console.Di2015NewLine    if (!foundMatch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("   *  File: " + path + " does not exist.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11213456Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System; Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices; Di2015NewLineusing ComTypes = System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ComHelper Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetValue(object comObj, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comObj == null)Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Marshal.IsComObject(comObj))Di2015NewLine            //The specified object is not a COM object Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IDispatch dispatch = comObj as IDispatch;Di2015NewLine        if (dispatch == null)Di2015NewLine            //The specified COM object doesn't support getting type information Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int language_id = 0;Di2015NewLine            int DISPATCH_METHOD = 0x1;Di2015NewLine            int DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET = 0x2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[] displayIDs = new int[1];Di2015NewLine            Guid empty = Guid.Empty;Di2015NewLine            string[] names = new string[] { name };Di2015NewLine            dispatch.GetIDsOfNames(ref empty, names, names.Length, language_id, displayIDs);Di2015NewLine            System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DISPPARAMS dspp = new System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DISPPARAMS();Di2015NewLine            System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.EXCEPINFO ei = new System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.EXCEPINFO();Di2015NewLine            IntPtr[] arg_err = new IntPtr[10];Di2015NewLine            object result;Di2015NewLine            if (1 == displayIDs.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dispatch.Invoke(displayIDs[0], ref empty, language_id, (ushort)(DISPATCH_METHOD | DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET), ref dspp, out result, ref ei, arg_err);Di2015NewLine                return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11216159Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Setup a directory entry of an array of RATIONAL or SRATIONAL andDi2015NewLine/// write the associated indirect values.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate bool writeRationalArray(ref TiffDirEntry dir, float[] v)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] t = new int [2 * dir.tdir_count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < dir.tdir_count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sign = 1;Di2015NewLine        float fv = v[i];Di2015NewLine        if (fv < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dir.tdir_type == TiffType.RATIONAL)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WarningExt(this, m_clientdata, m_name,Di2015NewLine                    "\\"{0}\\": Information lost writing value ({1:G}) as (unsigned) RATIONAL",Di2015NewLine                    FieldWithTag(dir.tdir_tag).Name, fv);Di2015NewLine                fv = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fv = -fv;Di2015NewLine                sign = -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int den = 1;Di2015NewLine        if (fv > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (fv < (1L << (31 - 3)) && den < (1L << (31 - 3)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fv *= 1 << 3;Di2015NewLine                den *= 1 << 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        t[2 * i + 0] = (int)(sign * (fv + 0.5));Di2015NewLine        t[2 * i + 1] = den;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return writeData(ref dir, t, 2 * dir.tdir_count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11216159Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Setup a directory entry of an array of RATIONAL or SRATIONAL andDi2015NewLine/// write the associated indirect values.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate bool writeRationalArray(ref TiffDirEntry dir, float[] v)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] t = new int [2 * dir.tdir_count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < dir.tdir_count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sign = 1;Di2015NewLine        float fv = v[i];Di2015NewLine        if (fv < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dir.tdir_type == TiffType.RATIONAL)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WarningExt(this, m_clientdata, m_name,Di2015NewLine                    "\\"{0}\\": Information lost writing value ({1:G}) as (unsigned) RATIONAL",Di2015NewLine                    FieldWithTag(dir.tdir_tag).Name, fv);Di2015NewLine                fv = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fv = -fv;Di2015NewLine                sign = -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int den = 1;Di2015NewLine        if (fv > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (fv < (1L << (31 - 3)) && den < (1L << (31 - 3)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fv *= 1 << 3;Di2015NewLine                den *= 1 << 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        t[2 * i + 0] = (int)(sign * (fv + 0.5));Di2015NewLine        t[2 * i + 1] = den;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Reduce the fractionDi2015NewLine        int a = t[0]; int b = t[1];Di2015NewLine        while (b > 0) { int rem = a % b; a = b; b = rem; }Di2015NewLine        for (int ind = 0; ind < 2; ind++) { t[ind] /= a; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return writeData(ref dir, t, 2 * dir.tdir_count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
